GE09ram_01_u:001.002a: ko nv asmin sāmprataṃ loke guṇavān kaś ca vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:001.002c: dharmajñaś ca kṛtajñaś ca satyavākyo dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.003a: cāritreṇa ca ko yuktaḥ sarvabhūteṣu ko hitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.003c: vidvān kaḥ kaḥ samarthaś ca kaś caikapriyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.004c: kasya bibhyati devāś ca jātaroṣasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_01_u:001.005a: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE09ram_01_u:001.005c: maharṣe tvaṃ samartho 'si jñātum evaṃvidhaṃ naram
GE09ram_01_u:001.006a: śrutvā caitat trilokajño vālmīker nārado vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.006c: śrūyatām iti cāmantrya prahṛṣṭo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:001.007a: bahavo durlabhāś caiva ye tvayā kīrtitā guṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.007c: mune vakṣyāmy ahaṃ buddhvā tair yuktaḥ śrūyatāṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.012a: dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.016c: samudra iva gāmbhīrye dhairyeṇa himavān iva
GE09ram_01_u:001.018a: dhanadena samas tyāge satye dharma ivāparaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.019a: jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhaguṇair yuktaṃ priyaṃ daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:001.020c: pūrvaṃ dattavarā devī varam enam ayācata
GE09ram_01_u:001.021c: vivāsayām āsa sutaṃ rāmaṃ daśarathaḥ priyam
GE09ram_01_u:001.022a: sa jagāma vanaṃ vīraḥ pratijñām anupālayan
GE09ram_01_u:001.023a: taṃ vrajantaṃ priyo bhrātā lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha
GE09ram_01_u:001.024c: sītāpy anugatā rāmaṃ śaśinaṃ rohiṇī yathā
GE09ram_01_u:001.025a: paurair anugato dūraṃ pitrā daśarathena ca
GE09ram_01_u:001.026a: te vanena vanaṃ gatvā nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.027a: ramyam āvasathaṃ kṛtvā ramamāṇā vane trayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.028c: rājā daśarathaḥ svargaṃ jagāma vilapan sutam
GE09ram_01_u:001.029a: mṛte tu tasmin bharato vasiṣṭhapramukhair dvijaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.030a: pāduke cāsya rājyāya nyāsaṃ dattvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.032a: rāmas tu punar ālakṣya nāgarasya janasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:001.033a: virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ hatvā śarabhaṅgaṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:001.033c: sutīkṣṇaṃ cāpy agastyaṃ ca agastya bhrātaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:001.035a: vasatas tasya rāmasya vane vanacaraiḥ saha
GE09ram_01_u:001.037c: kharaṃ triśirasaṃ caiva dūṣaṇaṃ caiva rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:001.038a: nijaghāna raṇe rāmas teṣāṃ caiva padānugān
GE09ram_01_u:001.039c: sahāyaṃ varayām āsa mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:001.040c: na virodho balavatā kṣamo rāvaṇa tena te
GE09ram_01_u:001.041a: anādṛtya tu tad vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ kālacoditaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.042c: jahāra bhāryāṃ rāmasya gṛdhraṃ hatvā jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_01_u:001.043a: gṛdhraṃ ca nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛtāṃ śrutvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_01_u:001.044a: tatas tenaiva śokena gṛdhraṃ dagdhvā jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_01_u:001.044c: mārgamāṇo vane sītāṃ rākṣasaṃ saṃdadarśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:001.045c: taṃ nihatya mahābāhur dadāha svargataś ca saḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.046a: sa cāsya kathayām āsa śabarīṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_01_u:001.048c: sugrīvāya ca tat sarvaṃ śaṃsad rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.049e: vālinaś ca balaṃ tatra kathayām āsa vānaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.050a: pratijñātaṃ ca rāmeṇa tadā vālivadhaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:001.050c: sugrīvaḥ śaṅkitaś cāsīn nityaṃ vīryeṇa rāghave
GE09ram_01_u:001.051a: rāghavaḥ pratyayārthaṃ tu dundubheḥ kāyam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:001.052a: bibheda ca punaḥ sālān saptaikena maheṣuṇā
GE09ram_01_u:001.052c: giriṃ rasātalaṃ caiva janayan pratyayaṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:001.053a: tataḥ prītamanās tena viśvastaḥ sa mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.053c: kiṣkindhāṃ rāmasahito jagāma ca guhāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:001.055c: sugrīvam eva tad rājye rāghavaḥ pratyapādayat
GE09ram_01_u:001.056a: sa ca sarvān samānīya vānarān vānararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.057a: tato gṛdhrasya vacanāt saṃpāter hanumān balī
GE09ram_01_u:001.059c: samāśvāsya ca vaidehīṃ mardayām āsa toraṇam
GE09ram_01_u:001.060a: pañca senāgragān hatvā sapta mantrisutān api
GE09ram_01_u:001.060c: śūram akṣaṃ ca niṣpiṣya grahaṇaṃ samupāgamat
GE09ram_01_u:001.061c: marṣayan rākṣasān vīro yantriṇas tān yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_01_u:001.062a: tato dagdhvā purīṃ laṅkām ṛte sītāṃ ca maithilīm
GE09ram_01_u:001.062c: rāmāya priyam ākhyātuṃ punar āyān mahākapiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.065a: darśayām āsa cātmānaṃ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.066a: tena gatvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ hatvā rāvaṇam āhave
GE09ram_01_u:001.068c: kṛtakṛtyas tadā rāmo vijvaraḥ pramumoda ha
GE09ram_01_u:001.069a: devatābhyo varān prāpya samutthāpya ca vānarān
GE09ram_01_u:001.069c: puṣpakaṃ tat samāruhya nandigrāmaṃ yayau tadā
GE09ram_01_u:001.070c: rāmaḥ sītām anuprāpya rājyaṃ punar avāptavān
GE09ram_01_u:001.072a: na putramaraṇaṃ ke cid drakṣyanti puruṣāḥ kva cit
GE09ram_01_u:001.073a: na vātajaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cin nāpsu majjanti jantavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.073c: na cāgrijaṃ bhayaṃ kiṃ cid yathā kṛtayuge tathā
GE09ram_01_u:001.075c: cāturvarṇyaṃ ca loke 'smin sve sve dharme niyokṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:001.077a: idaṃ pavitraṃ pāpaghnaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam
GE09ram_01_u:001.078a: etad ākhyānam āyuṣyaṃ paṭhan rāmāyaṇaṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:001.079a: paṭhan dvijo vāgṛṣabhatvam īyāt; syāt kṣatriyo bhūmipatitvam īyāt
GE09ram_01_u:001.079c: vaṇigjanaḥ paṇyaphalatvam īyāj; janaś ca śūdro 'pi mahattvam īyāt
GE09ram_01_u:002.001a: nāradasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā vākyaviśāradaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.002a: yathāvat pūjitas tena devarṣir nāradas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:002.003a: sa muhūtaṃ gate tasmin devalokaṃ munis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:002.004a: sa tu tīraṃ samāsādya tamasāyā mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.004c: śiṣyam āha sthitaṃ pārśve dṛṣṭvā tīrtham akardamam
GE09ram_01_u:002.006a: nyasyatāṃ kalaśas tāta dīyatāṃ valkalaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:002.007c: prāyacchata munes tasya valkalaṃ niyato guroḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.008c: vicacāra ha paśyaṃs tat sarvato vipulaṃ vanam
GE09ram_01_u:002.010a: tasmāt tu mithunād ekaṃ pumāṃsaṃ pāpaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.011c: bhāryā tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rurāva karuṇāṃ giram
GE09ram_01_u:002.012a: tathā tu taṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣādena nipātitam
GE09ram_01_u:002.013c: niśāmya rudatīṃ krauñcīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:002.014a: mā niṣāda pratiṣṭhāṃ tvam agamaḥ śāśvatīṃ samāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.015a: tasyaivaṃ bruvataś cintā babhūva hṛdi vīkṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.015c: śokārtenāsya śakuneḥ kim idaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:002.016a: cintayan sa mahāprājñaś cakāra matimān matim
GE09ram_01_u:002.016c: śiṣyaṃ caivābravīd vākyam idaṃ sa munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.017c: śokārtasya pravṛtto me śloko bhavatu nānyathā
GE09ram_01_u:002.018a: śiṣyas tu tasya bruvato muner vākyam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:002.019a: so 'bhiṣekaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā tīrthe tasmin yathāvidhi
GE09ram_01_u:002.019c: tam eva cintayann artham upāvartata vai muniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.020a: bharadvājas tataḥ śiṣyo vinītaḥ śrutavān guroḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.021c: upaviṣṭaḥ kathāś cānyāś cakāra dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.023a: vālmīkir atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya vāg yataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.026c: tad gatenaiva manasā vālmīkir dhyānam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.027c: yas tādṛśaṃ cāruravaṃ krauñcaṃ hanyād akāraṇāt
GE09ram_01_u:002.028a: śocann eva muhuḥ krauñcīm upaślokam imaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.029a: tam uvāca tato brahmā prahasan munipuṃgavam
GE09ram_01_u:002.029c: śloka eva tvayā baddho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE09ram_01_u:002.030a: macchandād eva te brahman pravṛtteyaṃ sarasvatī
GE09ram_01_u:002.030c: rāmasya caritaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kuru tvam ṛṣisattama
GE09ram_01_u:002.031c: vṛttaṃ kathaya dhīrasya yathā te nāradāc chrutam
GE09ram_01_u:002.032a: rahasyaṃ ca prakāśaṃ ca yad vṛttaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.032c: rāmasya saha saumitre rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.033a: vaidehyāś caiva yad vṛttaṃ prakāśaṃ yadi vā rahaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.033c: tac cāpy aviditaṃ sarvaṃ viditaṃ te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:002.034a: na te vāg anṛtā kāvye kā cid atra bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:002.034c: kuru rāma kathāṃ puṇyāṃ ślokabaddhāṃ manoramām
GE09ram_01_u:002.035a: yāvat sthāsyanti girayaḥ saritaś ca mahītale
GE09ram_01_u:002.036a: yāvad rāmasya ca kathā tvatkṛtā pracariṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:002.036c: tāvad ūrdhvam adhaś ca tvaṃ mallokeṣu nivatsyasi
GE09ram_01_u:002.037c: tataḥ saśiṣyo vālmīkir munir vismayam āyayau
GE09ram_01_u:002.038a: tasya śiṣyās tataḥ sarve jaguḥ ślokam imaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.038c: muhur muhuḥ prīyamāṇāḥ prāhuś ca bhṛśavismitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.039a: samākṣaraiś caturbhir yaḥ pādair gīto maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_01_u:002.040a: tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā vālmīker bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:002.040c: kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyam īdṛśaiḥ karavāṇy aham
GE09ram_01_u:002.041a: udāravṛttārthapadair manoramais; tadāsya rāmasya cakāra kīrtimān
GE09ram_01_u:002.041c: samākṣaraiḥ ślokaśatair yaśasvino; yaśaskaraṃ kāvyam udāradhīr muniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:003.001a: śrutvā vas tu samagraṃ tad dharmātmā dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_01_u:003.001c: vyaktam anveṣate bhūyo yad vṛttaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:003.004c: jānakyāś ca vivāhaṃ ca dhanuṣaś ca vibhedanam
GE09ram_01_u:003.006c: rājñaḥ śokaṃ vilāpaṃ ca paralokasya cāśrayam
GE09ram_01_u:003.009c: prasādanaṃ ca rāmasya pituś ca salilakriyām
GE09ram_01_u:003.012c: mārīcasya vadhaṃ caiva vaidehyā haraṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:003.017c: diśaḥ prasthāpanaṃ caiva pṛthivyāś ca nivedanam
GE09ram_01_u:003.024c: saṃgamaṃ ca samudrasya nalasetoś ca bandhanam
GE09ram_01_u:003.026c: rāvaṇasya vināśaṃ ca sītāvāptim areḥ pure
GE09ram_01_u:003.029a: anāgataṃ ca yat kiṃ cid rāmasya vasudhātale
GE09ram_01_u:003.029c: tac cakārottare kāvye vālmīkir bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:004.002a: kṛtvā tu tan mahāprājñaḥ sabhaviṣyaṃ sahottaram
GE09ram_01_u:004.002c: cintayām āsa ko nv etat prayuñjīyād iti prabhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:004.005a: sa tu medhāvinau dṛṣṭvā vedeṣu pariniṣṭhitau
GE09ram_01_u:004.006a: kāvyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sītāyāś caritaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:004.006c: paulastya vadham ity eva cakāra caritavrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:004.007a: pāṭhye geye ca madhuraṃ pramāṇais tribhir anvitam
GE09ram_01_u:004.009a: tau tu gāndharvatattvajñau sthāna mūrcchana kovidau
GE09ram_01_u:004.011a: tau rājaputrau kārtsnyena dharmyam ākhyānam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:004.011c: vāco vidheyaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā kāvyam aninditau
GE09ram_01_u:004.012a: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca dvijātīnāṃ sādhūnāṃ ca samāgame
GE09ram_01_u:004.013a: tau kadā cit sametānām ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:004.014c: sādhu sādhv ity tāv ūcatuḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:004.016a: aho gītasya mādhuryaṃ ślokānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:004.016c: ciranirvṛttam apy etat pratyakṣam iva darśitam
GE09ram_01_u:004.017a: praviśya tāv ubhau suṣṭhu tadā bhāvam agāyatām
GE09ram_01_u:004.019a: prītaḥ kaś cin munis tābhyāṃ saṃsthitaḥ kalaśaṃ dadau
GE09ram_01_u:004.019c: prasanno valkalaṃ kaś cid dadau tābhyāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:004.020c: paraṃ kavīnām ādhāraṃ samāptaṃ ca yathākramam
GE09ram_01_u:004.021a: praśasyamānau sarvatra kadā cit tatra gāyakau
GE09ram_01_u:004.023a: āsīnaḥ kāñcane divye sa ca siṃhāsane prabhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:004.024a: dṛṣṭvā tu rūpasaṃpannau tāv ubhau vīṇinau tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:004.024c: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaḥ śatrughnaṃ bharataṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:004.026a: imau munī pārthivalakṣmaṇānvitau; kuśīlavau caiva mahātapasvinau
GE09ram_01_u:004.026c: mamāpi tad bhūtikaraṃ pracakṣate; mahānubhāvaṃ caritaṃ nibodhata
GE09ram_01_u:004.027a: tatas tu tau rāmavacaḥ pracoditāv; agāyatāṃ mārgavidhānasaṃpadā
GE09ram_01_u:004.027c: sa cāpi rāmaḥ pariṣadgataḥ śanair; bubhūṣayāsaktamanā babhūva
GE09ram_01_u:005.001a: sarvāpūrvam iyaṃ yeṣām āsīt kṛtsnā vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_01_u:005.002a: yeṣāṃ sa sagaro nāma sāgaro yena khānitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:005.003a: ikṣvākūṇām idaṃ teṣāṃ rājñāṃ vaṃśe mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:005.003c: mahad utpannam ākhyānaṃ rāmāyaṇam iti śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:005.004a: tad idaṃ vartayiṣyāmi sarvaṃ nikhilam āditaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:005.005a: kosalo nāma muditaḥ sphīto janapado mahān
GE09ram_01_u:005.006c: manunā mānavendreṇa yā purī nirmitā svayam
GE09ram_01_u:005.007a: āyatā daśa ca dve ca yojanāni mahāpurī
GE09ram_01_u:005.009c: purīm āvāsayām āsa divi devapatir yathā
GE09ram_01_u:005.018a: dundubhībhir mṛdaṅgaiś ca vīṇābhiḥ paṇavais tathā
GE09ram_01_u:005.018c: nāditāṃ bhṛśam atyarthaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tām anuttamām
GE09ram_01_u:005.020a: ye ca bāṇair na vidhyanti viviktam aparāparam
GE09ram_01_u:005.021c: hantāro niśitaiḥ śastrair balād bāhubalair api
GE09ram_01_u:005.022c: purīm āvāsayām āsa rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:005.023a: tām agnimadbhir guṇavadbhir āvṛtāṃ; dvijottamair vedaṣaḍaṅgapāragaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:005.023c: sahasradaiḥ satyaratair mahātmabhir; maharṣikalpair ṛṣibhiś ca kevalaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.004c: tathā daśaratho rājā vasañ jagad apālayat
GE09ram_01_u:006.006a: tasmin puravare hṛṣṭā dharmātmanā bahu śrutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.006c: narās tuṣṭādhanaiḥ svaiḥ svair alubdhāḥ satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.007a: nālpasaṃnicayaḥ kaś cid āsīt tasmin purottame
GE09ram_01_u:006.008a: kāmī vā na kadaryo vā nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣaḥ kva cit
GE09ram_01_u:006.008c: draṣṭuṃ śakyam ayodhyāyāṃ nāvidvān na ca nāstikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.009a: sarve narāś ca nāryaś ca dharmaśīlāḥ susaṃyatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.012c: kaś cid āsīd ayodhyāyāṃ na ca nirvṛttasaṃkaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.014a: na nāstiko nānṛtako na kaś cid abahuśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.014c: nāsūyako na cāśakto nāvidvān vidyate tadā
GE09ram_01_u:006.015a: na dīnaḥ kṣiptacitto vā vyathito vāpi kaś cana
GE09ram_01_u:006.015c: kaś cin naro vā nārī vā nāśrīmān nāpy arūpavān
GE09ram_01_u:006.016c: dīrghāyuṣo narāḥ sarve dharmaṃ satyaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.017a: kṣatraṃ brahmamukhaṃ cāsīd vaiśyāḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.022a: añjanād api niṣkrāntair vāmanād api ca dvipaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:006.022c: bhadramandrair bhadramṛgair mṛgamandraiś ca sā purī
GE09ram_01_u:006.023c: sā yojane ca dve bhūyaḥ satyanāmā prakāśate
GE09ram_01_u:006.024a: tāṃ satyanāmāṃ dṛḍhatoraṇārgalām; gṛhair vicitrair upaśobhitāṃ śivām
GE09ram_01_u:006.024c: purīm ayodhyāṃ nṛsahasrasaṃkulāṃ; śaśāsa vai śakrasamo mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:007.003c: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca mantriṇaś ca tathāpare
GE09ram_01_u:007.005c: krodhāt kāmārthahetor vā na brūyur anṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:007.006a: teṣām aviditaṃ kiṃ cit sveṣu nāsti pareṣu vā
GE09ram_01_u:007.007c: prāptakālaṃ yathā daṇḍaṃ dhārayeyuḥ suteṣv api
GE09ram_01_u:007.008c: ahitaṃ cāpi puruṣaṃ na vihiṃsyur adūṣakam
GE09ram_01_u:007.009a: vīrāṃś ca niyatotsāhā rāja śāstram anuṣṭhitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:007.011c: nāsīt pure vā rāṣṭre vā mṛṣāvādī naraḥ kva cit
GE09ram_01_u:007.012a: kaś cin na duṣṭas tatrāsīt paradāraratir naraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:007.012c: praśāntaṃ sarvam evāsīd rāṣṭraṃ puravaraṃ ca tat
GE09ram_01_u:007.013a: suvāsasaḥ suveśāś ca te ca sarve suśīlinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:007.014a: gurau guṇagṛhītāś ca prakhyātāś ca parākramaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:007.015a: īdṛśais tair amātyais tu rājā daśaratho 'naghaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:007.016c: nādhyagacchad viśiṣṭaṃ vā tulyaṃ vā śatrum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:007.017a: tair mantribhir mantrahitair niviṣṭair; vṛto 'nuraktaiḥ kuśalaiḥ samarthaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:007.017c: sa pārthivo dīptim avāpa yuktas; tejomayair gobhir ivodito 'rkaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:008.001a: tasya tv evaṃ prabhāvasya dharmajñasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:008.002c: sutārthaṃ vājimedhena kimarthaṃ na yajāmy aham
GE09ram_01_u:008.003a: sa niścitāṃ matiṃ kṛtvā yaṣṭavyam iti buddhimān
GE09ram_01_u:008.003c: mantribhiḥ saha dharmātmā sarvair eva kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:008.004c: śīghram ānaya me sarvān gurūṃs tān sapurohitān
GE09ram_01_u:008.005a: etac chrutvā rahaḥ sūto rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:008.006c: ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau rājaṃs tava putrāgamaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:008.007a: kāśyapasya tu putro 'sti vibhāṇḍaka iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:008.007c: ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātas tasya putro bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:008.008a: sa vane nityasaṃvṛddho munir vanacaraḥ sadā
GE09ram_01_u:008.009c: lokeṣu prathitaṃ rājan vipraiś ca kathitaṃ sadā
GE09ram_01_u:008.016c: prayaccha kanyāṃ śāntāṃ vai vidhinā susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:008.017a: teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā cintāṃ prapatsyate
GE09ram_01_u:008.017c: kenopāyena vai śakyam ihānetuṃ sa vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:008.018a: tato rājā viniścitya saha mantribhir ātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:008.019a: te tu rājño vacaḥ śrutvā vyathitā vanatānanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:008.019c: na gacchema ṛṣer bhītā anuneṣyanti taṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_01_u:008.020a: vakṣyanti cintayitvā te tasyopāyāṃś ca tān kṣamān
GE09ram_01_u:008.020c: āneṣyāmo vayaṃ vipraṃ na ca doṣo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:008.022a: ṛṣyaśṛṅgas tu jāmātā putrāṃs tava vidhāsyati
GE09ram_01_u:009.001a: sumantraś codito rājñā provācedaṃ vacas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:009.001c: yatharṣyaśṛṅgas tv ānītaḥ śṛṇu me mantribhiḥ saha
GE09ram_01_u:009.003c: anabhijñaḥ sa nārīṇāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ sukhasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:009.006a: śrutvā tatheti rājā ca pratyuvāca purohitam
GE09ram_01_u:009.006c: purohito mantriṇaś ca tathā cakruś ca te tadā
GE09ram_01_u:009.007a: vāramukhyās tu tac chrutvā vanaṃ praviviśur mahat
GE09ram_01_u:009.009c: strī vā pumān vā yac cānyat sattvaṃ nagara rāṣṭrajam
GE09ram_01_u:009.010a: tataḥ kadā cit taṃ deśam ājagāma yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_01_u:009.012a: kas tvaṃ kiṃ vartase brahmañ jñātum icchāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:009.012c: ekas tvaṃ vijane ghore vane carasi śaṃsa naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.013a: adṛṣṭarūpās tās tena kāmyarūpā vane striyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.013c: hārdāt tasya matir jātā ākhyātuṃ pitaraṃ svakam
GE09ram_01_u:009.014c: ṛṣyaśṛṅga iti khyātaṃ nāma karma ca me bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:009.015c: kariṣye vo 'tra pūjāṃ vai sarveṣāṃ vidhipūrvakam
GE09ram_01_u:009.016a: ṛṣiputravacaḥ śrutvā sarvāsāṃ matir āsa vai
GE09ram_01_u:009.016c: tad āśramapadaṃ draṣṭuṃ jagmuḥ sarvāś ca tena ha
GE09ram_01_u:009.017a: gatānāṃ tu tataḥ pūjām ṛṣiputraś cakāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:009.017c: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam idaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.018a: pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ sarvā eva samutsukāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.018c: ṛṣer bhītāś ca śīghraṃ tu gamanāya matiṃ dadhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.019a: asmākam api mukhyāni phalānīmāni vai dvija
GE09ram_01_u:009.019c: gṛhāṇa prati bhadraṃ te bhakṣayasva ca mā ciram
GE09ram_01_u:009.020a: tatas tās taṃ samāliṅgya sarvā harṣasamanvitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.020c: modakān pradadus tasmai bhakṣyāṃś ca vividhāñ śubhān
GE09ram_01_u:009.021a: tāni cāsvādya tejasvī phalānīti sma manyate
GE09ram_01_u:009.022a: āpṛcchya ca tadā vipraṃ vratacaryāṃ nivedya ca
GE09ram_01_u:009.022c: gacchanti smāpadeśāt tā bhītās tasya pituḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.024a: tato 'paredyus taṃ deśam ājagāma sa vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:009.024c: manojñā yatra tā dṛṣṭā vāramukhyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.025a: dṛṣṭvaiva ca tadā vipram āyāntaṃ hṛṣṭa mānasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.025c: upasṛtya tataḥ sarvās tās tam ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.026a: ehy āśramapadaṃ saumya asmākam iti cābruvan
GE09ram_01_u:009.026c: tatrāpy eṣa vidhiḥ śrīmān viśeṣeṇa bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:009.027a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ hṛdayaṃgamam
GE09ram_01_u:009.027c: gamanāya matiṃ cakre taṃ ca ninyus tadā striyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.028a: tatra cānīyamāne tu vipre tasmin mahātmani
GE09ram_01_u:009.028c: vavarṣa sahasā devo jagat prahlādayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_01_u:009.029c: pratyudgamya muniṃ prahvaḥ śirasā ca mahīṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.030a: arghyaṃ ca pradadau tasmai nyāyataḥ susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.030c: vavre prasādaṃ viprendrān mā vipraṃ manyur āviśet
GE09ram_01_u:009.031c: śāntāṃ śāntena manasā rājā harṣam avāpa saḥ
GE09ram_01_u:009.032a: evaṃ sa nyavasat tatra sarvakāmaiḥ supūjitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.001a: bhūya eva ca rājendra śṛṇu me vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_01_u:010.001c: yathā sa devapravaraḥ kathayām āsa buddhimān
GE09ram_01_u:010.003a: aṅgarājena sakhyaṃ ca tasya rājño bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:010.003c: kanyā cāsya mahābhāgā śāntā nāma bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:010.004a: putras tv aṅgasya rājñas tu romapāda iti śrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.004c: taṃ sa rājā daśaratho gamiṣyati mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.005a: anapatyo 'smi dharmātmañ śāntā bhāryā mama kratum
GE09ram_01_u:010.006a: śrutvā rājño 'tha tad vākyaṃ manasā sa vicintya ca
GE09ram_01_u:010.007a: pratigṛhya ca taṃ vipraṃ sa rājā vigatajvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.008a: taṃ ca rājā daśaratho yaṣṭukāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.009a: yajñārthaṃ prasavārthaṃ ca svargārthaṃ ca nareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.009c: labhate ca sa taṃ kāmaṃ dvija mukhyād viśāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.011a: evaṃ sa devapravaraḥ pūrvaṃ kathitavān kathām
GE09ram_01_u:010.012a: sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tam ānaya susatkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:010.013a: anumānya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca sūtavākyaṃ niśamya ca
GE09ram_01_u:010.013c: sāntaḥpuraḥ sahāmātyaḥ prayayau yatra sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.014a: vanāni saritaś caiva vyatikramya śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.014c: abhicakrāma taṃ deśaṃ yatra vai munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.016a: tato rājā yathānyāyaṃ pūjāṃ cakre viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.017c: sakhyaṃ saṃbandhakaṃ caiva tadā taṃ pratyapūjayat
GE09ram_01_u:010.019a: śāntā tava sutā rājan saha bhartrā viśāmpate
GE09ram_01_u:010.019c: madīyaṃ nagaraṃ yātu kāryaṃ hi mahad udyatam
GE09ram_01_u:010.020a: tatheti rājā saṃśrutya gamanaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.020c: uvāca vacanaṃ vipraṃ gaccha tvaṃ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_01_u:010.021a: ṛṣiputraḥ pratiśrutya tathety āha nṛpaṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:010.022a: tāv anyonyāñjaliṃ kṛtvā snehāt saṃśliṣya corasā
GE09ram_01_u:010.023c: paurebhyaḥ preṣayām āsa dūtān vai śīghragāminaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.023e: kriyatāṃ nagaraṃ sarvaṃ kṣipram eva svalaṃkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:010.024a: tataḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ paurās te śrutvā rājānam āgatam
GE09ram_01_u:010.024c: tathā pracakrus tat sarvaṃ rājñā yat preṣitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:010.025a: tataḥ svalaṃkṛtaṃ rājā nagaraṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:010.026a: tataḥ pramuditāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā vai nāgarā dvijam
GE09ram_01_u:010.027a: antaḥpuraṃ praveśyainaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tu śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.029a: pūjyamānā ca tābhiḥ sā rājñā caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:010.029c: uvāsa tatra sukhitā kaṃ cit kālaṃ saha dvijā
GE09ram_01_u:011.001a: tataḥ kāle bahutithe kasmiṃś cit sumanohare
GE09ram_01_u:011.002a: tataḥ prasādya śirasā taṃ vipraṃ devavarṇinam
GE09ram_01_u:011.002c: yajñāya varayām āsa saṃtānārthaṃ kulasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:011.003a: tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca ca susatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:011.003c: saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_01_u:011.005c: samānayat sa tān viprān samastān vedapāragān
GE09ram_01_u:011.006a: suyajñaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālim atha kāśyapam
GE09ram_01_u:011.006c: purohitaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:011.007a: tān pūjayitvā dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:011.008a: mama lālapyamānasya putrārthaṃ nāsti vai sukham
GE09ram_01_u:011.009a: tad ahaṃ yaṣṭum icchāmi śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE09ram_01_u:011.010a: tataḥ sādhv iti tad vākyaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:011.011c: saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantāṃ te turagaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_01_u:011.012c: yasya te dhārmikī buddhir iyaṃ putrārtham āgatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:011.013a: tataḥ prīto 'bhavad rājā śrutvā tad dvijabhāṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:011.014a: gurūṇāṃ vacanāc chīghraṃ saṃbhārāḥ saṃbhriyantu me
GE09ram_01_u:011.016a: śakyaḥ kartum ayaṃ yajñaḥ sarveṇāpi mahīkṣitā
GE09ram_01_u:011.016c: nāparādho bhavet kaṣṭo yady asmin kratusattame
GE09ram_01_u:011.018a: tad yathāvidhi pūrvaṃ me kratur eṣa samāpyate
GE09ram_01_u:011.019a: tatheti ca tataḥ sarve mantriṇaḥ pratyapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:011.020a: tato dvijās te dharmajñam astuvan pārthivarṣabham
GE09ram_01_u:011.020c: anujñātās tataḥ sarve punar jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:011.021a: gatānāṃ tu dvijātīnāṃ mantriṇas tān narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:011.021c: visarjayitvā svaṃ veśma praviveśa mahā dyutiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:012.001a: punaḥ prāpte vasante tu pūrṇaḥ saṃvatsaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:012.001c: abhivādya vasiṣṭhaṃ ca nyāyataḥ pratipūjya ca
GE09ram_01_u:012.002c: yajño me kriyatāṃ vipra yathoktaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:012.003a: yathā na vighnaḥ kriyate yajñāṅgeṣu vidhīyatām
GE09ram_01_u:012.003c: bhavān snigdhaḥ suhṛn mahyaṃ guruś ca paramo bhavān
GE09ram_01_u:012.004a: voḍhavyo bhavatā caiva bhāro yajñasya codyataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:012.004c: tatheti ca sa rājānam abravīd dvijasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:012.005a: kariṣye sarvam evaitad bhavatā yat samarthitam
GE09ram_01_u:012.012a: dātavyam annaṃ vidhivat satkṛtya na tu līlayā
GE09ram_01_u:012.014a: teṣām api viśeṣeṇa pūjā kāryā yathākramam
GE09ram_01_u:012.014c: yathā sarvaṃ suvihitaṃ na kiṃ cit parihīyate
GE09ram_01_u:012.015c: tataḥ sarve samāgamya vasiṣṭham idam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:012.016a: yathoktaṃ tat kariṣyāmo na kiṃ cit parihāsyate
GE09ram_01_u:012.016c: tataḥ sumantram āhūya vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:012.017a: nimantrayasya nṛpatīn pṛthivyāṃ ye ca dhārmikāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:012.017c: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:012.019c: tam ānaya mahābhāgaṃ svayam eva susatkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:012.019e: pūrvasaṃbandhinaṃ jñātvā tataḥ pūrvaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_01_u:012.023c: dākṣiṇātyān narendrāṃś ca samastān ānayasva ha
GE09ram_01_u:012.024a: santi snigdhāś ca ye cānye rājānaḥ pṛthivītale
GE09ram_01_u:012.025a: vasiṣṭhavākyaṃ tac chrutvā sumantras tvaritas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:012.025c: vyādiśat puruṣāṃs tatra rājñām ānayane śubhān
GE09ram_01_u:012.026a: svayam eva hi dharmātmā prayayau muniśāsanāt
GE09ram_01_u:012.027a: te ca karmāntikāḥ sarve vasiṣṭhāya ca dhīmate
GE09ram_01_u:012.027c: sarvaṃ nivedayanti sma yajñe yad upakalpitam
GE09ram_01_u:012.028a: tataḥ prīto dvijaśreṣṭhas tān sarvān punar abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:012.028c: avajñayā na dātavyaṃ kasya cil līlayāpi vā
GE09ram_01_u:012.028e: avajñayā kṛtaṃ hanyād dātāraṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:012.029a: tataḥ kaiś cid ahorātrair upayātā mahīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:012.029c: bahūni ratnāny ādāya rājño daśarathasya ha
GE09ram_01_u:012.030a: tato vasiṣṭhaḥ suprīto rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:012.031c: yajñiyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ rājan puruṣaiḥ susamāhitaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:012.032a: niryātu ca bhavān yaṣṭuṃ yajñāyatanam antikāt
GE09ram_01_u:013.001a: atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe tasmin prāpte turaṅgame
GE09ram_01_u:013.004c: cakruś ca vidhivat sarvam adhikaṃ karma śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.005a: abhipūjya tato hṛṣṭāḥ sarve cakrur yathāvidhi
GE09ram_01_u:013.006a: na cāhutam abhūt tatra skhalitaṃ vāpi kiṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:013.006c: dṛśyate brahmavat sarvaṃ kṣemayuktaṃ hi cakrire
GE09ram_01_u:013.007a: na teṣv ahaḥsu śrānto vā kṣudhito vāpi dṛśyate
GE09ram_01_u:013.008a: brāhmaṇā bhuñjate nityaṃ nāthavantaś ca bhuñjate
GE09ram_01_u:013.008c: tāpasā bhujate cāpi śramaṇā bhuñjate tathā
GE09ram_01_u:013.009a: vṛddhāś ca vyādhitāś caiva striyo bālās tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:013.010a: dīyatāṃ dīyatām annaṃ vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_01_u:013.010c: iti saṃcoditās tatra tathā cakrur anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.011c: divase divase tatra siddhasya vidhivat tadā
GE09ram_01_u:013.012a: annaṃ hi vidhivat svādu praśaṃsanti dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.012c: aho tṛptāḥ sma bhadraṃ te iti śuśrāva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.014a: karmāntare tadā viprā hetuvādān bahūn api
GE09ram_01_u:013.015a: divase divase tatra saṃstare kuśalā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.016c: sadasyas tasya vai rājño nāvādakuśalo dvijaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.017a: prāpte yūpocchraye tasmin ṣaḍ bailvāḥ khādirās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:013.020a: vinyastā vidhivat sarve śilpibhiḥ sukṛtā dṛḍhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.021a: ācchāditās te vāsobhiḥ puṣpair gandhaiś ca bhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.022a: iṣṭakāś ca yathānyāyaṃ kāritāś ca pramāṇataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.022e: sa cityo rājasiṃhasya saṃcitaḥ kuśalair dvijaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.023c: niyuktās tatra paśavas tat tad uddiśya daivatam
GE09ram_01_u:013.024c: śāmitre tu hayas tatra tathā jala carāś ca ye
GE09ram_01_u:013.025a: ṛtvigbhiḥ sarvam evaitan niyuktaṃ śāstratas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:013.025c: paśūnāṃ triśataṃ tatra yūpeṣu niyataṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:013.026a: kausalyā taṃ hayaṃ tatra paricarya samantataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.027a: patatriṇā tadā sārdhaṃ susthitena ca cetasā
GE09ram_01_u:013.029c: ṛtvik parama saṃpannaḥ śrapayām āsa śāstrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.030a: dhūmagandhaṃ vapāyās tu jighrati sma narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.031a: hayasya yāni cāṅgāni tāni sarvāṇi brāhmaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.036a: prācīṃ hotre dadau rājā diśaṃ svakulavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.036c: adhvaryave pratīcīṃ tu brahmaṇe dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_01_u:013.038a: kratuṃ samāpya tu tadā nyāyataḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.038c: ṛtvigbhyo hi dadau rājā dharāṃ tāṃ kratuvardhanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.039a: ṛtvijas tv abruvan sarve rājānaṃ gatakalmaṣam
GE09ram_01_u:013.039c: bhavān eva mahīṃ kṛtsnām eko rakṣitum arhati
GE09ram_01_u:013.040a: na bhūmyā kāryam asmākaṃ na hi śaktāḥ sma pālane
GE09ram_01_u:013.040c: ratāḥ svādhyāyakaraṇe vayaṃ nityaṃ hi bhūmipa
GE09ram_01_u:013.040e: niṣkrayaṃ kiṃ cid eveha prayacchatu bhavān iti
GE09ram_01_u:013.041a: gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi daśa tebhyo dadau nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.042a: ṛtvijas tu tataḥ sarve pradaduḥ sahitā vasu
GE09ram_01_u:013.043a: tatas te nyāyataḥ kṛtvā pravibhāgaṃ dvijottamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.044a: tataḥ prītamanā rājā prāpya yajñam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:013.045c: kulasya vardhanaṃ tat tu kartum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:013.046a: tatheti ca sa rājānam uvāca dvijasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:013.046c: bhaviṣyanti sutā rājaṃś catvāras te kulodvahāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:014.001a: medhāvī tu tato dhyātvā sa kiṃ cid idam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:014.001c: labdhasaṃjñas tatas taṃ tu vedajño nṛpam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:014.003a: tataḥ prākramad iṣṭiṃ tāṃ putrīyāṃ putra kāraṇāt
GE09ram_01_u:014.004a: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:014.005a: tāḥ sametya yathānyāyaṃ tasmin sadasi devatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:014.006c: sarvānno bādhate vīryāc chāsituṃ taṃ na śaknumaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:014.007a: tvayā tasmai varo dattaḥ prītena bhagavan purā
GE09ram_01_u:014.007c: mānayantaś ca taṃ nityaṃ sarvaṃ tasya kṣamāmahe
GE09ram_01_u:014.008a: udvejayati lokāṃs trīn ucchritān dveṣṭi durmatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:014.009a: ṛṣīn yakṣān sagandharvān asurān brāhmaṇāṃs tathā
GE09ram_01_u:014.010a: nainaṃ sūryaḥ pratapati pārśve vāti na mārutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:014.010c: calormimālī taṃ dṛṣṭvā samudro 'pi na kampate
GE09ram_01_u:014.011a: tan manan no bhayaṃ tasmād rākṣasād ghoradarśanāt
GE09ram_01_u:014.011c: vadhārthaṃ tasya bhagavann upāyaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:014.012a: evam uktaḥ suraiḥ sarvaiś cintayitvā tato 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:014.013c: avadhyo 'smīti vāg uktā tathety uktaṃ ca tan mayā
GE09ram_01_u:014.014a: nākīrtayad avajñānāt tad rakṣo mānuṣāṃs tadā
GE09ram_01_u:014.014c: tasmāt sa mānuṣād vadhyo mṛtur nānyo 'sya vidyate
GE09ram_01_u:014.015a: etac chrutvā priyaṃ vākyaṃ brahmaṇā samudāhṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:014.015c: devā maharṣayaḥ sarve prahṛṣṭās te 'bhavaṃs tadā
GE09ram_01_u:014.016c: brahmaṇā ca samāgamya tatra tasthau samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:014.017a: tam abruvan surāḥ sarve samabhiṣṭūya saṃnatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:014.019a: tatra tvaṃ mānuṣo bhūtvā pravṛddhaṃ lokakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_01_u:014.019c: avadhyaṃ daivatair viṣṇo samare jahi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:014.020a: sa hi devān sagandharvān siddhāṃś ca ṛṣisattamān
GE09ram_01_u:014.021a: tad uddhataṃ rāvaṇam ṛddhatejasaṃ; pravṛddhadarpaṃ tridaśeśvaradviṣam
GE09ram_01_u:014.021c: virāvaṇaṃ sādhu tapasvikaṇṭakaṃ; tapasvinām uddhara taṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_01_u:015.001c: jānann api surān evaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:015.002a: upāyaḥ ko vadhe tasya rākṣasādhipateḥ surāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:015.002c: yam ahaṃ taṃ samāsthāya nihanyām ṛṣikaṇṭakam
GE09ram_01_u:015.003a: evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcur viṣṇum avyayam
GE09ram_01_u:015.003c: mānuṣīṃ tanum āsthāya rāvaṇaṃ jahi saṃyuge
GE09ram_01_u:015.004a: sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ dīrghakālam ariṃdama
GE09ram_01_u:015.005a: saṃtuṣṭaḥ pradadau tasmai rākṣasāya varaṃ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:015.006c: tasmāt tasya vadho dṛṣṭo mānuṣebhyaḥ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_01_u:015.007a: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā surāṇāṃ viṣṇur ātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:015.007c: pitaraṃ rocayām āsa tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_01_u:015.008a: sa cāpy aputro nṛpatis tasmin kāle mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:015.013c: pragṛhya vipulāṃ dorbhyāṃ svayaṃ māyāmayīm iva
GE09ram_01_u:015.014c: prājāpatyaṃ naraṃ viddhi mām ihābhyāgataṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:015.015a: tataḥ paraṃ tadā rājā pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:015.015c: bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kim ahaṃ karavāṇi te
GE09ram_01_u:015.016a: atho punar idaṃ vākyaṃ prājāpatyo naro 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:015.016c: rājann arcayatā devān adya prāptam idaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:015.018c: tāsu tvaṃ lapsyase putrān yadarthaṃ yajase nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:015.020a: abhivādya ca tad bhūtam adbhutaṃ priyadarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:015.024c: pāyasaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva putrīyaṃ tv idam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:015.025c: ardhād ardhaṃ dadau cāpi sumitrāyai narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:015.027c: evaṃ tāsāṃ dadau rājā bhāryāṇāṃ pāyasaṃ pṛthak
GE09ram_01_u:015.028a: tās tv etat pāyasaṃ prāpya narendrasyottamāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:016.001a: putratvaṃ tu gate viṣṇau rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:016.001c: uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ svayambhūr bhagavān idam
GE09ram_01_u:016.005a: apsaraḥsu ca mukhyāsu gandharvīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca
GE09ram_01_u:016.006a: kiṃnarīṇāṃ ca gātreṣu vānarīṇāṃ tanūṣu ca
GE09ram_01_u:016.007a: te tathoktā bhagavatā tat pratiśrutya śāsanam
GE09ram_01_u:016.007c: janayām āsur evaṃ te putrān vānararūpiṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:016.008c: cāraṇāś ca sutān vīrān sasṛjur vanacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:016.011a: yasya devasya yad rūpaṃ veṣo yaś ca parākramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:016.011c: ajāyata samastena tasya tasya sutaḥ pṛthak
GE09ram_01_u:016.012c: ṛkṣīṣu ca tathā jātā vānarāḥ kiṃnarīṣu ca
GE09ram_01_u:016.014c: kṣobhayeyuś ca vegena samudraṃ saritāṃ patim
GE09ram_01_u:016.015c: nabhastalaṃ viśeyuś ca gṛhṇīyur api toyadān
GE09ram_01_u:016.016a: gṛhṇīyur api mātaṅgān mattān pravrajato vane
GE09ram_01_u:016.018c: anye nānāvidhāñ śailān kānanāni ca bhejire
GE09ram_01_u:016.019a: sūryaputraṃ ca sugrīvaṃ śakraputraṃ ca vālinam
GE09ram_01_u:016.019c: bhrātarāv upatasthus te sarva eva harīśvarāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.001a: nirvṛtte tu kratau tasmin hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.003a: yathārhaṃ pūjitās tena rājñā vai pṛthivīśvarāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.008c: sākṣād viṣṇoś caturbhāgaḥ sarvaiḥ samudito guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.010a: rājñaḥ putrā mahātmānaś catvāro jajñire pṛthak
GE09ram_01_u:017.012a: saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇam iti śatrughnam aparaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:017.013a: teṣāṃ ketur iva jyeṣṭho rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.013c: babhūva bhūyo bhūtānāṃ svayambhūr iva saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.014a: sarve vedavidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve lokahite ratāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.017c: na ca tena vinā nidrāṃ labhate puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.017e: mṛṣṭam annam upānītam aśnāti na hi taṃ vinā
GE09ram_01_u:017.018a: yadā hi hayam ārūḍho mṛgayāṃ yāti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.019c: prāṇaiḥ priyataro nityaṃ tasya cāsīt tathā priyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.020a: sa caturbhir mahābhāgaiḥ putrair daśarathaḥ priyaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.021a: te yadā jñānasaṃpannāḥ sarve samuditā guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.022a: atha rājā daśarathas teṣāṃ dārakriyāṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:017.024a: sa rājño darśanākāṅkṣī dvārādhyakṣān uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:017.024c: śīghram ākhyāta māṃ prāptaṃ kauśikaṃ gādhinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:017.025a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya rājaveśma pradudruvuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.026a: te gatvā rājabhavanaṃ viśvāmitram ṛṣiṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:017.027a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sapurodhāḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.028a: sa dṛṣṭvā jvalitaṃ dīptyā tāpasaṃ saṃśitavratam
GE09ram_01_u:017.030c: ṛṣīṃś ca tān yathā nyāyaṃ mahābhāgān uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:017.031a: te sarve hṛṣṭamanasas tasya rājño niveśanam
GE09ram_01_u:017.031c: viviśuḥ pūjitās tatra niṣeduś ca yathārthataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.033e: pranaṣṭasya yathā lābho yathā harṣo mahodaye
GE09ram_01_u:017.034a: kaṃ ca te paramaṃ kāmaṃ karomi kim u harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:017.034c: pātrabhūto 'si me vipra diṣṭyā prāpto 'si dhārmika
GE09ram_01_u:017.034e: adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ ca sujīvitam
GE09ram_01_u:017.036a: tad adbhutam idaṃ vipra pavitraṃ paramaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:017.037a: brūhi yat prārthitaṃ tubhyaṃ kāryam āgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:017.038a: kāryasya na vimarśaṃ ca gantum arhasi kauśika
GE09ram_01_u:017.038c: kartā cāham aśeṣeṇa daivataṃ hi bhavān mama
GE09ram_01_u:017.039a: iti hṛdayasukhaṃ niśamya vākyaṃ; śrutisukham ātmavatā vinītam uktam
GE09ram_01_u:017.039c: prathitaguṇayaśā guṇair viśiṣṭaḥ; parama ṛṣiḥ paramaṃ jagāma harṣam
GE09ram_01_u:018.003a: yat tu me hṛdgataṃ vākyaṃ tasya kāryasya niścayam
GE09ram_01_u:018.004c: tasya vighnakarau dvau tu rākṣasau kāmarūpiṇau
GE09ram_01_u:018.005a: vrate me bahuśaś cīrṇe samāptyāṃ rākṣasāv imau
GE09ram_01_u:018.005c: mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau
GE09ram_01_u:018.007a: na ca me krodham utsraṣṭuṃ buddhir bhavati pārthiva
GE09ram_01_u:018.007c: tathābhūtā hi sā caryā na śāpas tatra mucyate
GE09ram_01_u:018.008c: kākapakṣadharaṃ śūraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ me dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:018.009a: śakto hy eṣa mayā gupto divyena svena tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:018.009c: rākṣasā ye vikartāras teṣām api vināśane
GE09ram_01_u:018.010a: śreyaś cāsmai pradāsyāmi bahurūpaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:018.010c: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yena khyātiṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:018.011a: na ca tau rāmam āsādya śaktau sthātuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:018.011c: na ca tau rāghavād anyo hantum utsahate pumān
GE09ram_01_u:018.012a: vīryotsiktau hi tau pāpau kālapāśavaśaṃ gatau
GE09ram_01_u:018.013a: na ca putrakṛtaṃ snehaṃ kartum arhasi pārthiva
GE09ram_01_u:018.013c: ahaṃ te pratijānāmi hatau tau viddhi rākṣasau
GE09ram_01_u:018.014c: vasiṣṭho 'pi mahātejā ye ceme tapasi sthitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:018.015a: yadi te dharmalābhaṃ ca yaśaś ca paramaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:018.015c: sthiram icchasi rājendra rāmaṃ me dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:018.016a: yady abhyanujñāṃ kākutstha dadate tava mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:018.016c: vasiṣṭha pramukhāḥ sarve tato rāmaṃ visarjaya
GE09ram_01_u:018.018a: nātyeti kālo yajñasya yathāyaṃ mama rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:018.018c: tathā kuruṣva bhadraṃ te mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:018.019a: ity evam uktvā dharmātmā dharmārthasahitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:018.020a: iti hṛdayamanovidāraṇaṃ; munivacanaṃ tad atīva śuśruvān
GE09ram_01_u:018.020c: narapatir agamad bhayaṃ mahad; vyathitamanāḥ pracacāla cāsanāt
GE09ram_01_u:019.001c: muhūrtam iva niḥsaṃjñaḥ saṃjñāvān idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:019.002c: na yuddhayogyatām asya paśyāmi saha rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.003a: iyam akṣauhiṇī pūrṇā yasyāhaṃ patir īśvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.003c: anayā saṃvṛto gatvā yodhāhaṃ tair niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.004a: ime śūrāś ca vikrāntā bhṛtyā me 'straviśāradāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.004c: yogyā rakṣogaṇair yoddhuṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:019.005c: yāvat prāṇān dhariṣyāmi tāvad yotsye niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.006c: ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmil na rāma netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:019.007a: bālo hy akṛtavidyaś ca na ca vetti balābalam
GE09ram_01_u:019.007e: na cāsau rakṣasāṃ yogyaḥ kūṭayuddhā hi te dhruvam
GE09ram_01_u:019.008a: viprayukto hi rāmeṇa muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_01_u:019.008c: jīvituṃ muniśārdūla na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:019.009a: yadi vā rāghavaṃ brahman netum icchasi suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:019.009c: caturaṅgasamāyuktaṃ mayā saha ca taṃ naya
GE09ram_01_u:019.010c: duḥkhenotpāditaś cāyaṃ na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:019.011a: caturṇām ātmajānāṃ hi prītiḥ paramikā mama
GE09ram_01_u:019.011c: jyeṣṭhaṃ dharmapradhānaṃ ca na rāmaṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:019.012a: kiṃ vīryā rākṣasās te ca kasya putrāś ca ke ca te
GE09ram_01_u:019.012c: kathaṃ pramāṇāḥ ke caitān rakṣanti munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:019.013a: kathaṃ ca pratikartavyaṃ teṣāṃ rāmeṇa rakṣasām
GE09ram_01_u:019.013c: māmakair vā balair brahman mayā vā kūṭayodhinām
GE09ram_01_u:019.014a: sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kathaṃ teṣāṃ mayā raṇe
GE09ram_01_u:019.016a: sa brahmaṇā dattavaras trailokyaṃ bādhate bhṛśam
GE09ram_01_u:019.018a: yadā svayaṃ na yajñasya vighnakartā mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.018c: tena saṃcoditau tau tu rākṣasau sumahā balau
GE09ram_01_u:019.018e: mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca yajñavighnaṃ kariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.019a: ity ukto muninā tena rājovāca muniṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:019.019c: na hi śakto 'smi saṃgrāme sthātuṃ tasya durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.020a: sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ dharmajña kuruṣva mama putrake
GE09ram_01_u:019.021a: na śaktā rāvaṇaṃ soḍhuṃ kiṃ punar mānavā yudhi
GE09ram_01_u:019.021c: sa hi vīryavatāṃ vīryam ādatte yudhi rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.022a: tena cāhaṃ na śakto 'smi saṃyoddhuṃ tasya vā balaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.022c: sabalo vā muniśreṣṭha sahito vā mamātmajaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:019.023c: bālaṃ me tanayaṃ brahman naiva dāsyāmi putrakam
GE09ram_01_u:019.024c: yajñavighnakarau tau te naiva dāsyāmi putrakam
GE09ram_01_u:019.025a: mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca vīryavantau suśikṣitau
GE09ram_01_u:020.002a: pūrvam arthaṃ pratiśrutya pratijñāṃ hātum icchasi
GE09ram_01_u:020.003a: yad idaṃ te kṣamaṃ rājan gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:020.004c: cacāla vasudhā kṛtsnā viveśa ca bhayaṃ surān
GE09ram_01_u:020.005a: trastarūpaṃ tu vijñāya jagat sarvaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:020.005c: nṛpatiṃ suvrato dhīro vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:020.006a: ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule jātaḥ sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:020.006c: dhṛtimānsuvrataḥ śrīmān na dharmaṃ hātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:020.007a: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyāto dharmātmā iti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:020.009a: kṛtāstram akṛtāstraṃ vā nainaṃ śakṣyanti rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:020.010a: eṣa vigrahavān dharma eṣa vīryavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:020.010c: eṣa buddhyādhiko loke tapasaś ca parāyaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:020.011c: nainam anyaḥ pumān vetti na ca vetsyanti ke cana
GE09ram_01_u:020.012a: na devā narṣayaḥ ke cin nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:020.013c: kauśikāya purā dattā yadā rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE09ram_01_u:020.015a: jayā ca suprabhā caiva dakṣakanye sumadhyame
GE09ram_01_u:020.016a: pañcāśataṃ sutāṃl lebhe jayā nāma varān purā
GE09ram_01_u:020.018a: tāni cāstrāṇi vetty eṣa yathāvat kuśikātmajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:020.018c: apūrvāṇāṃ ca janane śakto bhūyaś ca dharmavit
GE09ram_01_u:020.019c: na rāmagamane rājan saṃśayaṃ gantum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:021.001a: tathā vasiṣṭhe bruvati rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:021.003a: sa putraṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya rājā daśarathaḥ priyam
GE09ram_01_u:021.004a: tato vāyuḥ sukhasparśo virajasko vavau tadā
GE09ram_01_u:021.006a: viśvāmitro yayāv agre tato rāmo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:021.006c: kākapakṣadharo dhanvī taṃ ca saumitrir anvagāt
GE09ram_01_u:021.008c: sthāṇuṃ devam ivācintyaṃ kumārāv iva pāvakī
GE09ram_01_u:021.010a: gṛhāṇa vatsa salilaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:021.010c: mantragrāmaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ balām atibalāṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:021.011a: na śramo na jvaro vā te na rūpasya viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:021.011c: na ca suptaṃ pramattaṃ vā dharṣayiṣyanti nairṛtāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:021.012a: na bāhvoḥ sadṛśo vīrye pṛthivyām asti kaś cana
GE09ram_01_u:021.012c: triṣu lokeṣu vā rāma na bhavet sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_01_u:021.013a: na saubhāgye na dākṣiṇye na jñāne buddhiniścaye
GE09ram_01_u:021.014a: etadvidyādvaye labdhe bhavitā nāsti te samaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:021.015c: balām atibalāṃ caiva paṭhataḥ pathi rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:021.015e: vidyādvayam adhīyāne yaśaś cāpy atulaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:021.016c: pradātuṃ tava kākutstha sadṛśas tvaṃ hi dhārmika
GE09ram_01_u:021.017a: kāmaṃ bahuguṇāḥ sarve tvayy ete nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:021.018a: tato rāmo jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā prahṛṣṭavadanaḥ śuciḥ
GE09ram_01_u:021.019c: ūṣus tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra sarayvāṃ susukhaṃ trayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:022.002a: kausalyā suprajā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
GE09ram_01_u:022.003c: snātvā kṛtodakau vīrau jepatuḥ paramaṃ japam
GE09ram_01_u:022.005a: tau prayāte mahāvīryau divyaṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:022.005c: dadṛśāte tatas tatra sarayvāḥ saṃgame śubhe
GE09ram_01_u:022.007a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītau rāghavau puṇyam āśramam
GE09ram_01_u:022.007c: ūcatus taṃ mahātmānaṃ viśvāmitram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:022.008a: kasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyaḥ ko nv asmin vasate pumān
GE09ram_01_u:022.008c: bhagavañ śrotum icchāvaḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi nau
GE09ram_01_u:022.009a: tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prahasya munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:022.009c: abravīc chrūyatāṃ rāma yasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:022.010a: kandarpo mūrtimān āsīt kāma ity ucyate budhaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:022.011e: dharṣayām āsa durmedhā huṃkṛtaś ca mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:022.013a: tasya gātraṃ hataṃ tatra nirdagdhasya mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:022.013c: aśarīraḥ kṛtaḥ kāmaḥ krodhād deveśvareṇa ha
GE09ram_01_u:022.014a: anaṅga iti vikhyātas tadā prabhṛti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:022.014c: sa cāṅgaviṣayaḥ śrīmān yatrāṅgaṃ sa mumoca ha
GE09ram_01_u:022.015a: tasyāyam āśramaḥ puṇyas tasyeme munayaḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:022.015c: śiṣyā dharmaparā vīra teṣāṃ pāpaṃ na vidyate
GE09ram_01_u:022.016c: puṇyayoḥ saritor madhye śvas tariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:022.017a: teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra tapo dīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_01_u:023.002a: te ca sarve mahātmāno munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:023.003c: ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:023.004a: viśvāmitras tathety uktvā tān ṛṣīn abhipūjya ca
GE09ram_01_u:023.004c: tatāra sahitas tābhyāṃ saritaṃ sāgaraṃ gamām
GE09ram_01_u:023.005c: vāriṇo bhidyamānasya kim ayaṃ tumulo dhvaniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:023.006c: kathayām āsa dharmātmā tasya śabdasya niścayam
GE09ram_01_u:023.010a: tābhyāṃ tu tāv ubhau kṛtvā praṇāmam atidhārmikau
GE09ram_01_u:023.014c: saṃkīrṇaṃ badarībhiś ca kiṃ nv idaṃ dāruṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_01_u:023.015c: śrūyatāṃ vatsa kākutstha yasyaitad dāruṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_01_u:023.016a: etau janapadau sphītau pūrvam āstāṃ narottama
GE09ram_01_u:023.016c: maladāś ca karūṣāś ca devanirmāṇa nirmitau
GE09ram_01_u:023.018a: tam indraṃ snāpayan devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:023.018c: kalaśaiḥ snāpayām āsur malaṃ cāsya pramocayan
GE09ram_01_u:023.019a: iha bhūmyāṃ malaṃ dattvā dattvā kāruṣam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:023.020a: nirmalo niṣkarūṣaś ca śucir indro yadābhavat
GE09ram_01_u:023.020c: dadau deśasya suprīto varaṃ prabhur anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:023.021a: imau janapadau sthītau khyātiṃ loke gamiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:023.022a: sādhu sādhv iti taṃ devāḥ pākaśāsanam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:023.022c: deśasya pūjāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtāṃ śakreṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_01_u:023.023c: maladāś ca karūṣāś ca muditau dhanadhānyataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:023.024a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya yakṣī vai kāmarūpiṇī
GE09ram_01_u:023.024c: balaṃ nāgasahasrasya dhārayantī tadā hy abhūt
GE09ram_01_u:023.025a: tāṭakā nāma bhadraṃ te bhāryā sundasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:023.026c: maladāṃś ca karūṣāṃś ca tāṭakā duṣṭacāriṇī
GE09ram_01_u:023.027c: ata eva ca gantavyaṃ tāṭakāyā vanaṃ yataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:023.028c: manniyogād imaṃ deśaṃ kuru niṣkaṇṭakaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:023.029a: na hi kaś cid imaṃ deśaṃ śakroty āgantum īdṛśam
GE09ram_01_u:023.030a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathaitad daruṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_01_u:023.030c: yakṣyā cotsāditaṃ sarvam adyāpi na nivartate
GE09ram_01_u:024.004a: pūrvam āsīn mahāyakṣaḥ suketur nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:024.004c: anapatyaḥ śubhācāraḥ sa ca tepe mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:024.005a: pitāmahas tu suprītas tasya yakṣapates tadā
GE09ram_01_u:024.005c: kanyāratnaṃ dadau rāma tāṭakāṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:024.006c: na tv eva putraṃ yakṣāya dadau brahmā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:024.008a: kasya cit tv atha kālalsya yakṣī putraṃ vyajāyata
GE09ram_01_u:024.008c: mārīcaṃ nāma durdharṣaṃ yaḥ śāpād rākṣaso 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:024.009a: sunde tu nihate rāma agastyam ṛṣisattamam
GE09ram_01_u:024.011c: idaṃ rūpam apahāya dāruṇaṃ rūpam astu te
GE09ram_01_u:024.014a: na hy enāṃ śāpasaṃsṛṣṭāṃ kaś cid utsahate pumān
GE09ram_01_u:024.014c: nihantuṃ triṣu lokeṣu tvām ṛte raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:024.015a: na hi te strīvadhakṛte ghṛṇā kāryā narottama
GE09ram_01_u:024.016c: adharmyāṃ jahi kākutsha dharmo hy asyā na vidyate
GE09ram_01_u:024.017a: śrūyate hi purā śakro virocanasutāṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:024.018a: viṣṇunā ca purā rāma bhṛgupatnī dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_01_u:025.003c: pitrā daśarathenāhaṃ nāvajñeyaṃ ca tad vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:025.004a: so 'haṃ pitur vacaḥ śrutvā śāsanād brahma vādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:025.006a: evam uktvā dhanurmadhye baddhvā muṣṭim ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:025.006c: jyāśabdam akarot tīvraṃ diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan
GE09ram_01_u:025.007c: tāṭakā ca susaṃkruddhā tena śabdena mohitā
GE09ram_01_u:025.008c: śrutvā cābhyadravad vegād yataḥ śabdo viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:025.009a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ kruddhāṃ vikṛtāṃ vikṛtānanām
GE09ram_01_u:025.010a: paśya lakṣmaṇa yakṣiṇyā bhairavaṃ dāruṇaṃ vapuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:025.010c: bhidyeran darśanād asyā bhīrūṇāṃ hṛdayāni ca
GE09ram_01_u:025.012a: na hy enām utsahe hantuṃ strīsvabhāvena rakṣitām
GE09ram_01_u:025.012c: vīryaṃ cāsyā gatiṃ cāpi haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:025.013a: evaṃ bruvāṇe rāme tu tāṭakā krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_01_u:025.014a: tām āpatantīṃ vegena vikrāntām aśanīm iva
GE09ram_01_u:025.014c: śareṇorasi vivyādha sā papāta mamāra ca
GE09ram_01_u:025.015a: tāṃ hatāṃ bhīmasaṃkāśāṃ dṛṣṭvā surapatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:025.015c: sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ surāś ca samapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:025.016c: surāś ca sarve saṃhṛṣṭā viśvāmitram athābruvan
GE09ram_01_u:025.017a: mune kauśike bhadraṃ te sendrāḥ sarve marudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:025.019a: pātrabhūtaś ca te brahmaṃs tavānugamane dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:025.019c: kartavyaṃ ca mahat karma surāṇāṃ rājasūnunā
GE09ram_01_u:025.020a: evam uktvā surāḥ sarve hṛṣṭā jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:025.021c: mūrdhni rāmam upāghrāya idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:025.022c: śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmas tad āśramapadaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:026.001a: atha tāṃ rajanīm uṣya viśvāmiro mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:026.002c: prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:026.004a: tāni divyāni bhadraṃ te dadāmy astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:026.004c: daṇḍacakraṃ mahad divyaṃ tava dāsyāmi rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:026.005a: dharmacakraṃ tato vīra kālacakraṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:026.005c: viṣṇucakraṃ tathātyugram aindraṃ cakraṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:026.006a: vajram astraṃ naraśreṣṭha śaivaṃ śūlavaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:026.006c: astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva aiṣīkam api rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:026.007a: dadāmi te mahābāho brāhmam astram anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:026.007c: gade dve caiva kākutstha modakī śikharī ubhe
GE09ram_01_u:026.008c: dharmapāśam ahaṃ rāma kālapāśaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:026.009a: vāruṇaṃ pāśam astraṃ ca dadāny aham anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:026.010a: dadāmi cāstraṃ painākam astraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:026.010c: āgneyam astra dayitaṃ śikharaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:026.011a: vāyavyaṃ prathamaṃ nāma dadāmi tava rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:026.011c: astraṃ hayaśiro nāma krauñcam astraṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:026.012a: śakti dvayaṃ ca kākutstha dadāmi tava cānagha
GE09ram_01_u:026.012c: kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ ghoraṃ kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:026.013a: dhārayanty asurā yāni dadāmy etāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:026.013c: vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca nandanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:026.014c: gāndharvam astraṃ dayitaṃ mānavaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:026.016c: paiśācam astraṃ dayitaṃ mohanaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:026.017c: saṃvartaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ mausalaṃ ca nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:026.018a: satyam astraṃ mahābāho tathā māyādharaṃ param
GE09ram_01_u:026.019a: somāstraṃ śiśiraṃ nāma tvāṣṭram astraṃ sudāmanam
GE09ram_01_u:026.019c: dāruṇaṃ ca bhagasyāpi śīteṣum atha mānavam
GE09ram_01_u:026.021a: sthitas tu prāṅmukho bhūtvā śucir nivaratas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:026.022a: japatas tu munes tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:026.023a: ūcuś ca muditā rāmaṃ sarve prāñjalayas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:026.023c: ime sma paramodāra kiṃkarās tava rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:026.024a: pratigṛhya ca kākutsthaḥ samālabhya ca pāṇinā
GE09ram_01_u:026.024c: manasā me bhaviṣyadhvam iti tāny abhyacodayat
GE09ram_01_u:027.001c: gacchann eva ca kākutstho viśvāmitram athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:027.002c: astrāṇāṃ tv aham icchāmi saṃhāraṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:027.004a: satyavantaṃ satyakīrtiṃ dhṛṣṭaṃ rabhasam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:027.006c: jyotiṣaṃ kṛśanaṃ caiva nairāśya vimalāv ubhau
GE09ram_01_u:027.010a: pratīccha mama bhadraṃ te pātrabhūto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:027.011c: ime sma naraśārdūla śādhi kiṃ karavāma te
GE09ram_01_u:027.012a: gamyatām iti tān āha yatheṣṭaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:027.013a: atha te rāmam āmantrya kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:027.013c: evam astv iti kākutstham uktvā jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:027.014a: sa ca tān rāghavo jñātvā viśvāmitraṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_01_u:027.014c: gacchann evātha madhuraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:027.015c: vṛkṣaṣaṇḍam ito bhāti paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE09ram_01_u:027.018a: sarvaṃ me śaṃsa bhagavan kasyāśramapadaṃ tv idam
GE09ram_01_u:027.018c: saṃprāptā yatra te pāpā brahmaghnā duṣṭacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:028.002c: siddhāśrama iti khyātaḥ siddho hy atra mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:028.003a: etasminn eva kāle tu rājā vairocanir baliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:028.003e: kārayām āsa tad rājyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:028.004c: samāgamya svayaṃ caiva viṣṇum ūcur ihāśrame
GE09ram_01_u:028.005a: balir vairocanir viṣṇo yajate yajñam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:028.006a: ye cainam abhivartante yācitāra itas tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:028.006c: yac ca yatra yathāvac ca sarvaṃ tebhyaḥ prayacchati
GE09ram_01_u:028.007c: vāmanatvaṃ gato viṣṇo kuru kalyāṇam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:028.008a: ayaṃ siddhāśramo nāma prasādāt te bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:028.008c: siddhe karmaṇi deveśa uttiṣṭha bhagavann itaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:028.010a: trīn kramān atha bhikṣitvā pratigṛhya ca mānataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:028.011a: mahendrāya punaḥ prādān niyamya balim ojasā
GE09ram_01_u:028.011c: trailokyaṃ sa mahātejāś cakre śakravaśaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:028.014c: tad āśramapadaṃ tāta tavāpy etad yathā mama
GE09ram_01_u:028.018a: adyaiva dīkṣāṃ praviśa bhadraṃ te munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:028.018c: siddhāśramo 'yaṃ siddhaḥ syāt satyam astu vacas tava
GE09ram_01_u:028.020a: kumārāv api tāṃ rātrim uṣitvā susamāhitau
GE09ram_01_u:029.001c: deśe kāle ca vākyajñāv abrūtāṃ kauśikaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:029.002a: bhagavañ śrotum icchāvo yasmin kāle niśācarau
GE09ram_01_u:029.003c: sarve te munayaḥ prītāḥ praśaśaṃsur nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_01_u:029.004a: adya prabhṛti ṣaḍrātraṃ rakṣataṃ rāghavau yuvām
GE09ram_01_u:029.004c: dīkṣāṃ gato hy eṣa munir maunitvaṃ ca gamiṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:029.005a: tau tu tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrau yaśasvinau
GE09ram_01_u:029.007a: atha kāle gate tasmin ṣaṣṭhe 'hani samāgate
GE09ram_01_u:029.007c: saumitram abravīd rāmo yatto bhava samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:029.009c: ākāśe ca mahāñ śabdaḥ prādur āsīd bhayānakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:029.010a: āvārya gaganaṃ megho yathā prāvṛṣi nirgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:029.011a: mārīcaś ca subāhuś ca tayor anucarās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:029.012c: lakṣmaṇaṃ tv abhisaṃprekṣya rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:029.016c: nirastaṃ dṛśya mārīcaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:029.017c: mohayitvā nayaty enaṃ na ca prāṇair viyujyate
GE09ram_01_u:029.019c: subāhur asi cikṣepa sa viddhaḥ prāpatad bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:029.021a: sa hatvā rākṣasān sarvān yajñaghnān raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:029.021c: ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitas tatra yathendro vijaye purā
GE09ram_01_u:029.022a: atha yajñe samāpte tu viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:029.022c: nirītikā diśo dṛṣṭvā kākutstham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:029.023c: siddhāśramam idaṃ satyaṃ kṛtaṃ rāma mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:030.001a: atha tāṃ rajanīṃ tatra kṛtārthau rāmalakṣaṇau
GE09ram_01_u:030.004c: ājñāpaya yatheṣṭaṃ vai śāsanaṃ karavāva kim
GE09ram_01_u:030.005a: evam ukte tatas tābhyāṃ sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:030.007c: adbhutaṃ ca dhanūratnaṃ tatra tvaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:030.008a: tad dhi pūrvaṃ naraśreṣṭha dattaṃ sadasi daivataiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:030.009a: nāsya devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:030.009c: kartum āropaṇaṃ śaktā na kathaṃ cana mānuṣāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:030.010a: dhanuṣas tasya vīryaṃ hi jijñāsanto mahīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:030.012a: tad dhi yajñaphalaṃ tena maithilenottamaṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:030.013a: evam uktvā munivaraḥ prasthānam akarot tadā
GE09ram_01_u:030.014a: svasti vo 'stu gamiṣyāmi siddhaḥ siddhāśramād aham
GE09ram_01_u:030.018a: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_01_u:030.020a: rāmo 'pi sahasaumitrir munīṃs tān abhipūjya ca
GE09ram_01_u:030.022a: bhagavan ko nv ayaṃ deśaḥ samṛddhavanaśobhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:030.022c: śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:031.001a: brahmayonir mahān āsīt kuśo nāma mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:031.001c: vaidarbhyāṃ janayām āsa caturaḥ sadṛśān sutān
GE09ram_01_u:031.002a: kuśāmbaṃ kuśanābhaṃ ca ādhūrta rajasaṃ vasum
GE09ram_01_u:031.002e: tān uvāca kuśaḥ putrān dharmiṣṭhān satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:031.003c: niveśaṃ cakrire sarve purāṇāṃ nṛvarās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:031.004a: kuśāmbas tu mahātejāḥ kauśāmbīm akarot purīm
GE09ram_01_u:031.004c: kuśanābhas tu dharmātmā paraṃ cakre mahodayam
GE09ram_01_u:031.005c: cakre puravaraṃ rājā vasuś cakre girivrajam
GE09ram_01_u:031.006a: eṣā vasumatī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:031.008a: saiṣā hi māgadhī rāma vasos tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:031.011a: gāyantyo nṛtyamānāś ca vādayantyaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:031.013c: dṛṣṭvā sarvātmako vāyur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:031.014a: ahaṃ vaḥ kāmaye sarvā bhāryā mama bhaviṣyatha
GE09ram_01_u:031.014c: mānuṣas tyajyatāṃ bhāvo dīrgham āyur avāpsyatha
GE09ram_01_u:031.015a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyor akliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:031.016a: antaś carasi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ surottama
GE09ram_01_u:031.016c: prabhāvajñāś ca te sarvāḥ kim asmān avamanyase
GE09ram_01_u:031.017c: sthānāc cyāvayituṃ devaṃ rakṣāmas tu tapo vayam
GE09ram_01_u:031.018a: mā bhūt sa kālo durmedhaḥ pitaraṃ satyavādinam
GE09ram_01_u:031.019a: pitā hi prabhur asmākaṃ daivataṃ paramaṃ hi saḥ
GE09ram_01_u:031.019c: yasya no dāsyati pitā sa no bhartā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:031.020a: tāsāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāyuḥ paramakopanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:031.021a: tāḥ kanyā vāyunā bhagnā viviśur nṛpater gṛham
GE09ram_01_u:031.021c: dṛṣṭvā bhagnās tadā rājā saṃbhrānta idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:031.022a: kim idaṃ kathyatāṃ putryaḥ ko dharmam avamanyate
GE09ram_01_u:031.022c: kubjāḥ kena kṛtāḥ sarvā veṣṭantyo nābhibhāṣatha
GE09ram_01_u:032.001a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.002c: aśubhaṃ mārgam āsthāya na dharmaṃ pratyavekṣate
GE09ram_01_u:032.003a: pitṛmatyaḥ sma bhadraṃ te svacchande na vayaṃ sthitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.003c: pitaraṃ no vṛṇīṣva tvaṃ yadi no dāsyate tava
GE09ram_01_u:032.004c: evaṃ bruvantyaḥ sarvāḥ sma vāyunā nihatā bhṛṣam
GE09ram_01_u:032.006a: kṣāntaṃ kṣamāvatāṃ putryaḥ kartavyaṃ sumahat kṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:032.007a: alaṃkāro hi nārīṇāṃ kṣamā tu puruṣasya vā
GE09ram_01_u:032.007c: duṣkaraṃ tac ca vaḥ kṣāntaṃ tridaśeṣu viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.008a: yādṛśīr vaḥ kṣamā putryaḥ sarvāsām aviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.008c: kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ ca putrikāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.009a: kṣamā yaśaḥ kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamāyāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat
GE09ram_01_u:032.010a: mantrajño mantrayām āsa pradānaṃ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.011a: etasminn eva kāle tu cūlī nāma mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.012a: tapyantaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tatra gandharvī paryupāsate
GE09ram_01_u:032.012c: somadā nāma bhadraṃ te ūrmilā tanayā tadā
GE09ram_01_u:032.013a: sā ca taṃ praṇatā bhūtvā śuśrūṣaṇaparāyaṇā
GE09ram_01_u:032.013c: uvāsa kāle dharmiṣṭhā tasyās tuṣṭo 'bhavad guruḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.014a: sa ca tāṃ kālayogena provāca raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:032.014c: parituṣṭo 'smi bhadraṃ te kiṃ karomi tava priyam
GE09ram_01_u:032.016c: brāhmeṇa tapasā yuktaṃ putram icchāmi dhārmikam
GE09ram_01_u:032.017a: apatiś cāsmi bhadraṃ te bhāryā cāsmi na kasya cit
GE09ram_01_u:032.017c: brāhmeṇopagatāyāś ca dātum arhasi me sutam
GE09ram_01_u:032.018a: tasyāḥ prasanno brahmarṣir dadau putram anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:032.018c: brahmadatta iti khyātaṃ mānasaṃ cūlinaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:032.019a: sa rājā brahmadattas tu purīm adhyavasat tadā
GE09ram_01_u:032.019c: kāmpilyāṃ parayā lakṣmyā devarājo yathā divam
GE09ram_01_u:032.020a: sa buddhiṃ kṛtavān rājā kuśanābhaḥ sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.022c: brahmadatto mahī pālas tāsāṃ devapatir yathā
GE09ram_01_u:032.023c: yuktāḥ paramayā lakṣmyā babhuḥ kanyāśataṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:032.024a: sa dṛṣṭvā vāyunā muktāḥ kuśanābho mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.024c: babhūva paramaprīto harṣaṃ lebhe punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:032.025c: sadāraṃ preṣayām āsa sopādhyāya gaṇaṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:032.026c: yathānyāyaṃ ca gandharvī snuṣās tāḥ pratyanandata
GE09ram_01_u:033.001a: kṛtodvāhe gate tasmin brahmadatte ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:033.003a: putras te sadṛśaḥ putra bhaviṣyati sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:033.003c: gādhiṃ prāpsyasi tena tvaṃ kīrtiṃ loke ca śāśvatīm
GE09ram_01_u:033.004a: evam uktvā kuśo rāma kuśanābhaṃ mahīpatim
GE09ram_01_u:033.005a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya kuśanābhasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:033.005c: jajñe paramadharmiṣṭho gādhir ity eva nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:033.006a: sa pitā mama kākutstha gādhiḥ paramadhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:033.007a: pūrvajā bhaginī cāpi mama rāghava suvratā
GE09ram_01_u:033.011a: sā tu satyavatī puṇyā satye dharme pratiṣṭhitā
GE09ram_01_u:033.012a: ahaṃ hi niyamād rāma hitvā tāṃ samupāgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:033.013a: eṣā rāma mamotpattiḥ svasya vaṃśasya kīrtitā
GE09ram_01_u:033.013c: deśasya ca mahābāho yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE09ram_01_u:033.014c: nidrām abhyehi bhadraṃ te mā bhūd vighno 'dhvanīha naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:033.015c: naiśena tamasā vyāptā diśaś ca raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:033.016a: śanair viyujyate saṃdhyā nabho netrair ivāvṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:033.017c: hlādayan prāṇināṃ loke manāṃsi prabhayā vibho
GE09ram_01_u:033.019c: sādhu sādhv iti taṃ sarve munayo hy abhyapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:033.020a: rāmo 'pi saha saumitriḥ kiṃ cid āgatavismayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:034.002a: suprabhātā niśā rāma pūrvā saṃdhyā pravartate
GE09ram_01_u:034.003a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā paurvāhṇikīṃ kriyām
GE09ram_01_u:034.003c: gamanaṃ rocayām āsa vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:034.005a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa viśvāmitro 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_01_u:034.005c: eṣa panthā mayoddiṣṭo yena yānti maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:034.006a: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ gate 'rdhadivase tadā
GE09ram_01_u:034.007e: tasyās tīre tataś cakrus te āvāsaparigraham
GE09ram_01_u:034.010c: bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:034.011c: vṛddhiṃ janma ca gaṅgāyā vaktum evopacakrame
GE09ram_01_u:034.012a: śailendro himavān nāma dhātūnām ākaro mahān
GE09ram_01_u:034.012c: tasya kanyā dvayaṃ rāma rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_01_u:034.013a: yā meruduhitā rāma tayor mātā sumadhyamā
GE09ram_01_u:034.013c: nāmnā menā manojñā vai patnī himavataḥ priyā
GE09ram_01_u:034.014a: tasyāṃ gaṅgeyam abhavaj jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā
GE09ram_01_u:034.014c: umā nāma dvitīyābhūt kanyā tasyaiva rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:034.015c: śailendraṃ varayām āsur gaṅgāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:034.018c: ugraṃ sā vratam āsthāya tapas tepe tapodhanā
GE09ram_01_u:034.019a: ugreṇa tapasā yuktāṃ dadau śailavaraḥ sutām
GE09ram_01_u:034.020a: ete te śaila rājasya sute lokanamaskṛte
GE09ram_01_u:034.020c: gaṅgā ca saritāṃ śreṣṭhā umā devī ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:034.021a: etat te dharmam ākhyātaṃ yathā tripathagā nadī
GE09ram_01_u:034.021c: khaṃ gatā prathamaṃ tāta gatiṃ gatimatāṃ vara
GE09ram_01_u:035.001a: ukta vākye munau tasminn ubhau rāghavalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_01_u:035.002a: dharmayuktam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:035.003c: trīn patho hetunā kena pāvayel lokapāvanī
GE09ram_01_u:035.004c: triṣu lokeṣu dharmajña karmabhiḥ kaiḥ samanvitā
GE09ram_01_u:035.007c: na cāpi tanayo rāma tasyām āsīt paraṃtapa
GE09ram_01_u:035.008c: yad ihotpadyate bhūtaṃ kas tat pratisahiṣyate
GE09ram_01_u:035.010a: na lokā dhārayiṣyanti tava tejaḥ surottama
GE09ram_01_u:035.010c: brāhmeṇa tapasā yukto devyā saha tapaś cara
GE09ram_01_u:035.011c: rakṣa sarvān imāṃl lokān nālokaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:035.012c: bāḍham ity abravīt sarvān punaś cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:035.013a: dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tejas tejasy eva sahomayā
GE09ram_01_u:035.014a: yad idaṃ kṣubhitaṃ sthānān mama tejo hy anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:035.014c: dhārayiṣyati kas tan me bruvantu surasattamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:035.015a: evam uktās tato devāḥ pratyūcur vṛṣabhadhvajam
GE09ram_01_u:035.015c: yat tejaḥ kṣubhitaṃ hy etat tad dharā dhārayiṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:035.017a: tato devāḥ punar idam ūcuś cātha hutāśanam
GE09ram_01_u:035.018a: tad agninā punar vyāptaṃ saṃjātaḥ śvetaparvataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:035.019a: athomāṃ ca śivaṃ caiva devāḥ sarṣi gaṇās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:035.020a: atha śaila sutā rāma tridaśān idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:035.021e: adya prabhṛti yuṣmākam aprajāḥ santu patnayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:035.022a: evam uktvā surān sarvāñ śaśāpa pṛthivīm api
GE09ram_01_u:035.023a: na ca putrakṛtāṃ prītiṃ matkrodhakaluṣī kṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:035.023c: prāpsyasi tvaṃ sudurmedhe mama putram anicchatī
GE09ram_01_u:035.024a: tān sarvān vrīḍitān dṛṣṭvā surān surapatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:035.025a: sa gatvā tapa ātiṣṭhat pārśve tasyottare gireḥ
GE09ram_01_u:035.026c: gaṅgāyāḥ prabhavaṃ caiva śṛṇu me sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:036.001a: tapyamāne tapo deve devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:036.003a: yo naḥ senāpatir deva datto bhagavatā purā
GE09ram_01_u:036.003c: sa tapaḥ param āsthāya tapyate sma sahomayā
GE09ram_01_u:036.004c: saṃvidhatsva vidhānajña tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:036.005c: sāntvayan madhurair vākyais tridaśān idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:036.006a: śailaputryā yad uktaṃ tan na prajāsyatha patniṣu
GE09ram_01_u:036.006c: tasyā vacanam akliṣṭaṃ satyam eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:036.007a: iyam ākāśagā gaṅgā yasyāṃ putraṃ hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:036.008c: umāyās tad bahumataṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:036.009a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtārthā raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:036.010a: te gatvā parvataṃ rāma kailāsaṃ dhātumaṇḍitam
GE09ram_01_u:036.012c: garbhaṃ dhāraya vai devi devatānām idaṃ priyam
GE09ram_01_u:036.013a: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā divyaṃ rūpam adhārayat
GE09ram_01_u:036.013c: sa tasyā mahimāṃ dṛṣṭvā samantād avakīryata
GE09ram_01_u:036.015c: aśaktā dhāraṇe deva tava tejaḥ samuddhatam
GE09ram_01_u:036.017a: śrutvā tv agnivaco gaṅgā taṃ garbham atibhāsvaram
GE09ram_01_u:036.018c: kāñcanaṃ dharaṇīṃ prāptaṃ hiraṇyam amalaṃ śubham
GE09ram_01_u:036.019c: malaṃ tasyābhavat tatra trapusīsakam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:036.020a: tad etad dharaṇīṃ prāpya nānādhātur avardhata
GE09ram_01_u:036.022a: jātarūpam iti khyātaṃ tadā prabhṛti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:036.023a: taṃ kumāraṃ tato jātaṃ sendrāḥ sahamarudgaṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:036.024a: tāḥ kṣīraṃ jātamātrasya kṛtvā samayam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:036.024c: daduḥ putro 'yam asmākaṃ sarvāsām iti niścitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:036.025a: tatas tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ kārtikeya iti bruvan
GE09ram_01_u:036.025c: putras trailokya vikhyāto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:036.026a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā skannaṃ garbhaparisrave
GE09ram_01_u:036.027a: skanda ity abruvan devāḥ skannaṃ garbhaparisravāt
GE09ram_01_u:036.028c: ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaḍānano bhūtvā jagrāha stanajaṃ payaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:036.029a: gṛhītvā kṣīram ekāhnā sukumāra vapus tadā
GE09ram_01_u:036.031a: eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā
GE09ram_01_u:036.031c: kumārasaṃbhavaś caiva dhanyaḥ puṇyas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:037.001a: tāṃ kathāṃ kauśiko rāme nivedya madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_01_u:037.001c: punar evāparaṃ vākyaṃ kākutstham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:037.002c: sagaro nāma dharmātmā prajākāmaḥ sa cāprajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:037.005a: tābhyāṃ saha tadā rājā patnībhyāṃ taptavāṃs tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:037.006a: atha varṣa śate pūrṇe tapasārādhito muniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:037.006c: sagarāya varaṃ prādād bhṛguḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:037.008a: ekā janayitā tāta putraṃ vaṃśakaraṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:037.010a: ekaḥ kasyāḥ suto brahman kā bahūñ janayiṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:037.010c: śrotum icchāvahe brahman satyam astu vacas tava
GE09ram_01_u:037.011a: tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhṛguḥ parama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:037.012a: eko vaṃśakaro vāstu bahavo vā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:037.012c: kīrtimanto mahotsāhāḥ kā vā kaṃ varam icchati
GE09ram_01_u:037.013a: munes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā keśinī raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:037.016a: atha kāle gate tasmiñ jyeṣṭhā putraṃ vyajāyata
GE09ram_01_u:037.020c: bālān gṛhītvā tu jale sarayvā raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:037.020e: prakṣipya prahasan nityaṃ majjatas tān nirīkṣya vai
GE09ram_01_u:037.021a: paurāṇām ahite yuktaḥ pitrā nirvāsitaḥ purāt
GE09ram_01_u:037.024a: sa kṛtvā niścayaṃ rājā sopādhyāyagaṇas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:038.002a: śrotum ichāmi bhadraṃ te vistareṇa kathām imām
GE09ram_01_u:038.002c: pūrvako me kathaṃ brahman yajñaṃ vai samupāharat
GE09ram_01_u:038.003a: viśvāmitras tu kākutstham uvāca prahasann iva
GE09ram_01_u:038.005a: tayor madhye pravṛtto 'bhūd yajñaḥ sa puruṣottama
GE09ram_01_u:038.005c: sa hi deśo naravyāghra praśasto yajñakarmaṇi
GE09ram_01_u:038.006c: aṃśumān akarot tāta sagarasya mate sthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:038.007a: tasya parvaṇi taṃ yajñaṃ yajamānasya vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:038.008a: hriyamāṇe tu kākutstha tasminn aśve mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:038.010a: yajñac chidraṃ bhavaty etat sarveṣām aśivāya naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:038.010c: tat tathā kriyatāṃ rājan yathāchidraḥ kratur bhavet
GE09ram_01_u:038.011a: upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā tasmin sadasi pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:038.011c: ṣaṣṭiṃ putrasahasrāṇi vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:038.012a: gatiṃ putrā na paśyāmi rakṣasāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:038.013a: tad gacchata vicinvadhvaṃ putrakā bhadram astu vaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:038.016c: iha sthāsyāmi bhadraṃ vo yāvat turagadarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:038.019a: śūlair aśanikalpaiś ca halaiś cāpi sudāruṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:039.001a: devatānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān vai pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:039.002c: kāpilaṃ rūpam āsthāya dhārayaty aniśaṃ dharām
GE09ram_01_u:039.003a: pṛthivyāś cāpi nirbhedo dṛṣṭa eva sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:039.005a: sagarasya ca putrāṇāṃ prādur āsīn mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:039.006a: tato bhittvā mahīṃ sarvāṃ kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:039.006c: sahitāḥ sagarāḥ sarve pitaraṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:039.007a: parikrāntā mahī sarvā sattvavantaś ca sūditāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:039.008a: na ca paśyāmahe 'śvaṃ tam aśvahartāram eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:039.008c: kiṃ kariṣyāma bhadraṃ te buddhir atra vicāryatām
GE09ram_01_u:039.009a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ rājasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:039.010a: bhūyaḥ khanata bhadraṃ vo nirbhidya vasudhātalam
GE09ram_01_u:039.014c: khedāc cālayate śīrṣaṃ bhūmikampas tadhā bhavet
GE09ram_01_u:039.015a: taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā diśāpālaṃ mahāgajam
GE09ram_01_u:039.015c: mānayanto hi te rāma jagmur bhittvā rasātalam
GE09ram_01_u:039.016a: tataḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ bhittvā dakṣiṇāṃ bibhiduḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:039.016c: dakṣiṇasyām api diśi dadṛśus te mahāgajam
GE09ram_01_u:039.017c: śirasā dhārayantaṃ te vismayaṃ jagmur uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:039.020a: taṃ te pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā cāpi nirāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:039.021c: bhadraṃ bhadreṇa vapuṣā dhārayantaṃ mahīm imām
GE09ram_01_u:039.022a: samālabhya tataḥ sarve kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:039.023a: tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā sāgarāḥ prathitāṃ diśam
GE09ram_01_u:039.024c: hayaṃ ca tasya devasya carantam avidūrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:039.026a: asmākaṃ tvaṃ hi turagaṃ yajñiyaṃ hṛtavān asi
GE09ram_01_u:039.026c: durmedhas tvaṃ hi saṃprāptān viddhi naḥ sagarātmajān
GE09ram_01_u:039.027a: śrutvā tad vacanaṃ teṣāṃ kapilo raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:040.002a: śūraś ca kṛtavidyaś ca pūrvais tulyo 'si tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:040.003c: teṣāṃ tvaṃ pratighātārthaṃ sāsiṃ gṛhṇīṣva kārmukam
GE09ram_01_u:040.005c: dhanur ādāya khaḍgaṃ ca jagāma laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.006a: sa khātaṃ pitṛbhir mārgam antarbhaumaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.008a: sa taṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā caiva nirāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:040.008c: pitḥn sa paripapraccha vājihartāram eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:040.009a: diśāgajas tu tac chrutvā prītyāhāṃśumato vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.010a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvān eva diśāgajān
GE09ram_01_u:040.011a: taiś ca sarvair diśāpālair vākyajñair vākyakovidaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.012a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā jagāma laghuvikramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.013a: sa duḥkhavaśam āpannas tv asamañjasutas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:040.013c: cukrośa paramārtas tu vadhāt teṣāṃ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.014a: yajñiyaṃ ca hayaṃ tatra carantam avidūrataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.017a: sa cainam abravīd vākyaṃ vainateyo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.018c: salilaṃ nārhasi prājña dātum eṣāṃ hi laukikam
GE09ram_01_u:040.020a: tayā klinnam idaṃ bhasma gaṅgayā lokakāntayā
GE09ram_01_u:040.022c: tvaritaṃ hayam ādāya punar āyān mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.024a: tac chrutvā ghorasaṃkāśaṃ vākyam aṃśumato nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:040.026a: agatvā niścayaṃ rājā kālena mahatā mahān
GE09ram_01_u:041.002a: sa rājā sumahān āsīd aṃśumān raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:041.002c: tasya putro mahān āsīd dilīpa iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:041.005a: dilīpas tu mahātejāḥ śrutvā paitāmahaṃ vadham
GE09ram_01_u:041.006c: tārayeyaṃ kathaṃ caitān iti cintā paro 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:041.008a: dilīpas tu mahātejā yajñair bahubhir iṣṭavān
GE09ram_01_u:041.009a: agatvā niścayaṃ rājā teṣām uddharaṇaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:041.012a: sa tapo dīrgham ātiṣṭhad gokarṇe raghunandana
GE09ram_01_u:041.013c: suprīto bhagavān brahmā prajānāṃ patir īśvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:041.015c: tapasā ca sutaptena varaṃ varaya suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:041.017a: yṛadi me bhagavān prīto yady asti tapasaḥ phalam
GE09ram_01_u:041.018c: svargaṃ gaccheyur atyantaṃ sarve me prapitāmahāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:041.019a: deyā ca saṃtator deva nāvasīdet kulaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_01_u:041.019c: ikṣvākūṇāṃ kule deva eṣa me 'stu varaḥ paraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:041.022a: iyaṃ haimavatī gaṅgā jyeṣṭhā himavataḥ sutā
GE09ram_01_u:041.022c: tāṃ vai dhārayituṃ rājan haras tatra niyujyatām
GE09ram_01_u:041.023a: gaṅgāyāḥ patanaṃ rājan pṛthivī na sahiṣyate
GE09ram_01_u:041.023c: tau vai dhārayituṃ vīra nānyaṃ paśyāmi śūlinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:041.024a: tam evam uktvā rājānaṃ gaṅgāṃ cābhāṣya lokakṛt
GE09ram_01_u:041.024c: jagāma tridivaṃ devaḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:042.003a: prītas te 'haṃ naraśreṣṭha kariṣyāmi tava priyam
GE09ram_01_u:042.004c: tadā sātimahad rūpaṃ kṛtvā vegaṃ ca duḥsaham
GE09ram_01_u:042.004e: ākāśād apatad rāma śive śivaśirasy uta
GE09ram_01_u:042.006c: visasarja tato gaṅgāṃ haro bindusaraḥ prati
GE09ram_01_u:042.008c: vyalokayanta te tatra gaganād gāṃ gatāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:042.010a: tad adbhutatamaṃ loke gaṅgā patanam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:042.012c: vidyudbhir iva vikṣiptair ākāśam abhavat tadā
GE09ram_01_u:042.014a: kva cid drutataraṃ yāti kuṭilaṃ kva cid āyatam
GE09ram_01_u:042.014c: vinataṃ kva cid uddhūtaṃ kva cid yāti śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:042.015a: salilenaiva salilaṃ kva cid abhyāhataṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:042.015c: muhur ūrdhvapathaṃ gatvā papāta vasudhāṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:042.018a: śāpāt prapatitā ye ca gaganād vasudhātalam
GE09ram_01_u:042.019c: punar ākāśam āviśya svāṃl lokān pratipedire
GE09ram_01_u:042.020a: mumude mudito lokas tena toyena bhāsvatā
GE09ram_01_u:042.021c: prāyād agre mahātejās taṃ gaṅgā pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt
GE09ram_01_u:042.023c: gaṅgām anvagaman prītāḥ sarve jalacarāś ca ye
GE09ram_01_u:042.024a: yato bhagīratho rājā tato gaṅgā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_01_u:043.001a: sa gatvā sāgaraṃ rājā gaṅgayānugatas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:043.001c: praviveśa talaṃ bhūmer yatra te bhasmasātkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:043.002a: bhasmany athāplute rāma gaṅgāyāḥ salilena vai
GE09ram_01_u:043.002c: sarva lokaprabhur brahmā rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:043.003a: tāritā naraśārdūla divaṃ yātāś ca devavat
GE09ram_01_u:043.004a: sāgarasya jalaṃ loke yāvat sthāsyati pārthiva
GE09ram_01_u:043.005a: iyaṃ ca duhitā jyeṣṭhā tava gaṅgā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:043.005c: tvatkṛtena ca nāmnā vai loke sthāsyati viśrutā
GE09ram_01_u:043.006a: gaṅgā tripathagā nāma divyā bhāgīrathīti ca
GE09ram_01_u:043.008a: pūrvakeṇa hi te rājaṃs tenātiyaśasā tadā
GE09ram_01_u:043.011c: punar na śaṅkitā netuṃ gaṅgāṃ prārthayatānagha
GE09ram_01_u:043.013a: yac ca gaṅgāvataraṇaṃ tvayā kṛtam ariṃdama
GE09ram_01_u:043.013c: anena ca bhavān prāpto dharmasyāyatanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:043.015c: svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi svaṃ lokaṃ gamyatāṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:043.017e: kṛtodakaḥ śucī rājā svapuraṃ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:043.018c: pramumoda ca lokas taṃ nṛpam āsādya rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:043.019a: eṣa te rāma gaṅgāyā vistaro 'bhihito mayā
GE09ram_01_u:043.020a: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svargyaṃ putryam athāpi ca
GE09ram_01_u:044.002a: atyadbhutam idaṃ brahman kathitaṃ paramaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:044.003a: tasya sā śarvarī sarvā saha saumitriṇā tadā
GE09ram_01_u:044.005a: gatā bhagavatī rātriḥ śrotavyaṃ paramaṃ śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:044.005e: imāṃ cintayataḥ sarvāṃ nikhilena kathāṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:044.006a: tarāma saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ puṇyāṃ tripathagāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_01_u:044.006c: naur eṣā hi sukhāstīrṇā ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
GE09ram_01_u:044.006e: bhagavantam iha prāptaṃ jñātvā tvaritam āgatā
GE09ram_01_u:044.007a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.008c: gaṅgākūle niviṣṭās te viśālāṃ dadṛśuḥ purīm
GE09ram_01_u:044.009c: viśālāṃ nagarīṃ ramyāṃ divyāṃ svargopamāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:044.010c: papraccha prāñjalir bhūtvā viśālām uttamāṃ purīm
GE09ram_01_u:044.011c: śrotum icchāmi bhadraṃ te paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE09ram_01_u:044.012a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmasya munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.013a: śrūyatāṃ rāma śakrasya kathāṃ kathayataḥ śubhām
GE09ram_01_u:044.013c: asmin deśe hi yad vṛttaṃ śṛṇu tattvena rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:044.014a: pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rāma diteḥ putrā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.015a: tatas teṣāṃ naraśreṣṭha buddhir āsīn mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:044.015c: amarā nirjarāś caiva kathaṃ syāma nirāmayāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.016a: teṣāṃ cintayatāṃ rāma buddhir āsīd vipaścitām
GE09ram_01_u:044.016c: kṣīrodamathanaṃ kṛtvā rasaṃ prāpsyāma tatra vai
GE09ram_01_u:044.017a: tato niścitya mathanaṃ yoktraṃ kṛtvā ca vāsukim
GE09ram_01_u:044.018a: atha dhanvantarir nāma apsarāś ca suvarcasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.018c: apsu nirmathanād eva rasāt tasmād varastriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.019c: asaṃkhyeyās tu kākutstha yās tāsāṃ paricārikāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.020a: na tāḥ sma pratigṛhṇanti sarve te devadānavāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.022a: diteḥ putrā na tāṃ rāma jagṛhur varuṇātmajām
GE09ram_01_u:044.022c: adites tu sutā vīra jagṛhus tām aninditām
GE09ram_01_u:044.023a: asurās tena daiteyāḥ surās tenāditeḥ sutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.023c: hṛṣṭāḥ pramuditāś cāsan vāruṇī grahaṇāt surāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.025a: atha tasya kṛte rāma mahān āsīt kulakṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:044.025c: adites tu tataḥ putrā diteḥ putrāṇa sūdayan
GE09ram_01_u:044.026a: aditer ātmajā vīrā diteḥ putrān nijaghnire
GE09ram_01_u:044.027a: nihatya ditiputrāṃs tu rājyaṃ prāpya puraṃdaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:045.001c: mārīcaṃ kāśyapaṃ rāma bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:045.003a: sāhaṃ tapaś cariṣyāmi garbhaṃ me dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:045.004a: tasyās tadvacanaṃ śrutvā mārīcaḥ kāśyapas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:045.005a: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te śucir bhava tapodhane
GE09ram_01_u:045.005c: janayiṣyasi putraṃ tvaṃ śakra hantāram āhave
GE09ram_01_u:045.006a: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śucir yadi bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:045.006c: putraṃ trailokya hantāraṃ mattas tvaṃ janayiṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:045.007a: evam uktvā mahātejāḥ pāṇinā sa mamārja tām
GE09ram_01_u:045.007c: samālabhya tataḥ svastīty uktvā sa tapase yayau
GE09ram_01_u:045.009a: tapas tasyāṃ hi kurvatyāṃ paricaryāṃ cakāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:045.010a: agniṃ kuśān kāṣṭham apaḥ phalaṃ mūlaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:045.010c: nyavedayat sahasrākṣo yac cānyad api kāṅkṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:045.011c: śakraḥ sarveṣu kāleṣu ditiṃ paricacāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:045.013a: tapaś carantyā varṣāṇi daśa vīryavatāṃ vara
GE09ram_01_u:045.013c: avaśiṣṭāni bhadraṃ te bhrātaraṃ drakṣyase tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:045.014a: tam ahaṃ tvatkṛte putra samādhāsye jayotsukam
GE09ram_01_u:045.015a: evam uktvā ditiḥ śakraṃ prāpte madhyaṃ divākare
GE09ram_01_u:045.016a: dṛṣṭvā tām aśuciṃ śakraḥ pādataḥ kṛtamūrdhajām
GE09ram_01_u:045.016c: śiraḥsthāne kṛtau pādau jahāsa ca mumoda ca
GE09ram_01_u:045.017c: garbhaṃ ca saptadhā rāma bibheda paramātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:045.018c: ruroda susvaraṃ rāma tato ditir abudhyata
GE09ram_01_u:045.019a: mā rudo mā rudaś ceti garbhaṃ śakro 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:045.019c: bibheda ca mahātejā rudantam api vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:045.020a: na hantavyo na hantavya ity evaṃ ditir abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:045.022c: abhindaṃ saptadhā devi tan me tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:046.001a: saptadhā tu kṛte garbhe ditiḥ paramaduḥkhitā
GE09ram_01_u:046.003a: priyaṃ tu kṛtam icchāmi mama garbhaviparyaye
GE09ram_01_u:046.003c: marutāṃ saptaṃ saptānāṃ sthānapālā bhavantv ime
GE09ram_01_u:046.004a: vātaskandhā ime sapta carantu divi putrakāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:046.005c: divi vāyur iti khyātas tṛtīyo 'pi mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:046.006a: catvāras tu suraśreṣṭha diśo vai tava śāsanāt
