GE09ram_01_u:046.006e: tvatkṛtenaiva nāmnā ca mārutā iti viśrutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:046.008a: sarvam etad yathoktaṃ te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:046.009a: evaṃ tau niścayaṃ kṛtvā mātāputrau tapovane
GE09ram_01_u:046.009c: jagmatus tridivaṃ rāma kṛtārthāv iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:046.010a: eṣa deśaḥ sa kākutstha mahendrādhyuṣitaḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:046.010c: ditiṃ yatra tapaḥ siddhām evaṃ paricacāra saḥ
GE09ram_01_u:046.012a: tena cāsīd iha sthāne viśāleti purī kṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:046.016c: somadattasya putras tu kākutstha iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:046.017a: tasya putro mahātejāḥ saṃpraty eṣa purīm imām
GE09ram_01_u:046.018a: ikṣvākos tu prasādena sarve vaiśālikā nṛpāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:046.019a: ihādya rajanīṃ rāma sukhaṃ vatsyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:046.019c: śvaḥ prabhāte naraśreṣṭha janakaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:046.021a: pūjāṃ ca paramāṃ kṛtvā sopādhyāyaḥ sabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:046.022a: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi yasya me viṣayaṃ mune
GE09ram_01_u:046.022c: saṃprāpto darśanaṃ caiva nāsti dhanyataro mama
GE09ram_01_u:047.004c: kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune
GE09ram_01_u:047.006a: kimarthaṃ ca naraśreṣṭhau saṃprāptau durgame pathi
GE09ram_01_u:047.007a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā yathāvṛtthaṃ nyavedayat
GE09ram_01_u:047.008c: atithī paramau prāptau putrau daśarathasya tau
GE09ram_01_u:047.009c: uṣya tatra niśām ekāṃ jagmatur mithilāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:047.010a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ sarve janakasya purīṃ śubhām
GE09ram_01_u:047.010c: sādhu sādhv iti śaṃsanto mithilāṃ samapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:047.012c: śrotum icchāmi bhagavan kasyāyaṃ pūrva āśramaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:047.013a: tac chrutā rāghaveṇoktaṃ vākyaṃ vākya viśāradaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:047.014a: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:047.016a: sa ceha tapa ātiṣṭhad ahalyāsahitaḥ purā
GE09ram_01_u:047.018c: saṃgamaṃ tv aham icchāmi tvayā saha sumadhyame
GE09ram_01_u:047.020c: kṛtārtho 'si suraśreṣṭha gaccha śīghram itaḥ prabho
GE09ram_01_u:047.020e: ātmānaṃ māṃ ca deveśa sarvadā rakṣa mānadaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:047.021a: indras tu prahasan vākyam ahalyām idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:047.022a: evaṃ saṃgamya tu tayā niścakrāmoṭajāt tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:047.022c: sa saṃbhramāt tvaran rāma śaṅkito gautamaṃ prati
GE09ram_01_u:047.026a: mama rūpaṃ samāsthāya kṛtavān asi durmate
GE09ram_01_u:047.026c: akartavyam idaṃ yasmād viphalas tvaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_01_u:047.028a: tathā śaptvā sa vai śakraṃ bhāryām api ca śaptavān
GE09ram_01_u:047.030a: yadā caitad vanaṃ ghoraṃ rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:047.031c: matsakāśe mudā yuktā svaṃ vapur dhārayiṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:048.001a: aphalas tu tataḥ śakro devān agnipurogamān
GE09ram_01_u:048.002c: krodham utpādya hi mayā surakāryam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:048.003a: aphalo 'smi kṛtas tena krodhāt sā ca nirākṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:048.004a: tan māṃ suravarāḥ sarve sarṣisaṃghāḥ sacāraṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:048.006a: ayaṃ meṣaḥ savṛṣaṇaḥ śakro hy avṛṣaṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:048.007a: aphalas tu kṛto meṣaḥ parāṃ tuṣṭiṃ pradāsyati
GE09ram_01_u:048.007c: bhavatāṃ harṣaṇārthāya ye ca dāsyanti mānavāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:048.008a: agnes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā pitṛdevāḥ samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:048.009c: aphalān bhuñjate meṣān phalais teṣām ayojayan
GE09ram_01_u:048.010a: indras tu meṣavṛṣaṇas tadā prabhṛti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:048.014a: prayatnān nirmitāṃ dhātrā divyāṃ māyāmayīm iva
GE09ram_01_u:048.016a: sa hi gautamavākyena durnirīkṣyā babhūva ha
GE09ram_01_u:048.016c: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ yāvad rāmasya darśanam
GE09ram_01_u:048.017a: rāghavau tu tatas tasyāḥ pādau jagṛhatus tadā
GE09ram_01_u:048.017c: smarantī gautamavacaḥ pratijagrāha sā ca tau
GE09ram_01_u:048.020a: sādhu sādhv iti devās tām ahalyāṃ samapūjayan
GE09ram_01_u:048.021c: rāmaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivat tapas tepe mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:048.022c: sakāśād vidhivat prāpya jagāma mithilāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:049.001a: tataḥ prāguttarāṃ gatvā rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_01_u:049.004c: deśo vidhīyatāṃ brahman yatra vatsyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:049.006a: viśvāmitraṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ śrutvā sa nṛpatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:049.007a: ṛtvijo 'pi mahātmānas tv arghyam ādāya satvaram
GE09ram_01_u:049.008a: pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:049.008c: papraccha kuśalaṃ rājño yajñasya ca nirāmayam
GE09ram_01_u:049.009a: sa tāṃś cāpi munīn pṛṣṭvā sopādhyāya purodhasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:049.011c: purodhā ṛtvijaś caiva rājā ca saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:049.012c: dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpatis tatra viśvāmitram athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:049.013a: adya yajñasamṛddhir me saphalā daivataiḥ kṛtā
GE09ram_01_u:049.015a: dvādaśāhaṃ tu brahmarṣe śeṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:049.015c: tato bhāgārthino devān draṣṭum arhasi kauśika
GE09ram_01_u:049.016c: punas taṃ paripapraccha prāñjaliḥ prayato nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:049.019c: kathaṃ padbhyām iha prāptau kimarthaṃ kasya vā mune
GE09ram_01_u:049.023c: tac cāgamanam avyagraṃ viśālāyāś ca darśanam
GE09ram_01_u:050.003a: sa tau niṣaṇṇau saṃprekṣya sukhāsīnau nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_01_u:050.004a: api te muniśārdūla mama mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_01_u:050.007a: api kauśika bhadraṃ te guruṇā mama saṃgatā
GE09ram_01_u:050.009a: api śāntena manasā gurur me kuśikātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:050.010a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:050.011a: nātikrāntaṃ muniśreṣṭha yat kartavyaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:050.012a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:050.013a: svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:050.014c: viśvāmitro mahātejā vetsy enaṃ paramāṃ gatim
GE09ram_01_u:050.015a: nāsti dhanyataro rāma tvatto 'nyo bhuvi kaś cana
GE09ram_01_u:050.015c: goptā kuśikaputras te yena taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:050.016c: yathābalaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE09ram_01_u:050.017a: rājābhūd eṣa dharmātmā dīrgha kālam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:050.017c: dharmajñaḥ kṛtavidyaś ca prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:050.018a: prajāpatisutas tv āsīt kuśo nāma mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:050.019a: kuśanābhasutas tv āsīd gādhir ity eva viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:050.021a: kadā cit tu mahātejā yojayitvā varūthinīm
GE09ram_01_u:050.022a: nagarāṇi ca rāṣṭrāṇi saritaś ca tathā girīn
GE09ram_01_u:051.001c: praṇato vinayād vīro vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
GE09ram_01_u:051.002a: svāgataṃ tava cety ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:051.002c: āsanaṃ cāsya bhagavān vasiṣṭho vyādideśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:051.004a: pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ vasiṣṭhād rājasattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:051.006c: papraccha japatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭho brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:051.007a: kaccit te kuśalaṃ rājan kaccid dharmeṇa rañjayan
GE09ram_01_u:051.008a: kaccit te subhṛtā bhṛtyāḥ kaccit tiṣṭhanti śāsane
GE09ram_01_u:051.008c: kaccit te vijitāḥ sarve ripavo ripusūdana
GE09ram_01_u:051.009a: kaccid bale ca kośe ca mitreṣu ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_01_u:051.011a: kṛtvobhau suciraṃ kālaṃ dharmiṣṭhau tāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:051.011c: mudā paramayā yuktau prīyetāṃ tau parasparam
GE09ram_01_u:051.012c: viśvāmitram idaṃ vākyam uvāca prahasann iva
GE09ram_01_u:051.014a: satkriyāṃ tu bhavān etāṃ pratīcchatu mayodyatām
GE09ram_01_u:051.015c: kṛtam ity abravīd rājā pūjāvākyena me tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:051.018a: evaṃ bruvantaṃ rājānaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ punar eva hi
GE09ram_01_u:051.019a: bāḍham ity eva gādheyo vasiṣṭhaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:051.020a: evam ukto mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:051.021a: ehy ehi śabale kṣipraṃ śṛṇu cāpi vaco mama
GE09ram_01_u:051.022c: tat sarvaṃ kāmadhug divye abhivarṣakṛte mama
GE09ram_01_u:051.023c: annānāṃ nicayaṃ sarvaṃ sṛjasva śabale tvara
GE09ram_01_u:052.001c: vidadhe kāmadhuk kāmān yasya yasya yathepsitam
GE09ram_01_u:052.002a: ikṣūn madhūṃs tathā lājān maireyāṃś ca varāsavān
GE09ram_01_u:052.002c: pānāni ca mahārhāṇi bhakṣyāṃś coccāvacāṃs tathā
GE09ram_01_u:052.003c: mṛṣṭānnāni ca sūpāś ca dadhikulyās tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:052.007c: yuktaḥ pareṇa harṣeṇa vasiṣṭham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:052.009c: ratnaṃ hi bhagavann etad ratnahārī ca pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:052.009e: tasmān me śabalāṃ dehi mamaiṣā dharmato dvija
GE09ram_01_u:052.010a: evam uktas tu bhagavān vasiṣṭho munisattamaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:052.011c: rājan dāsyāmi śabalāṃ rāśibhī rajatasya vā
GE09ram_01_u:052.012c: śāśvatī śabalā mahyaṃ kīrtir ātmavato yathā
GE09ram_01_u:052.013a: asyāṃ havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ ca prāṇayātrā tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:052.013c: āyattam agnihotraṃ ca balir homas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:052.014c: āyattam atra rājarṣe sarvam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:052.015a: sarva svam etat satyena mama tuṣṭikarī sadā
GE09ram_01_u:052.015c: kāraṇair bahubhī rājan na dāsye śabalāṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:052.019c: sahasram ekaṃ daśa ca dadāmi tava suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:052.020c: dadāmy ekāṃ gavāṃ koṭiṃ śabalā dīyatāṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:052.021a: evam uktas tu bhagavān viśvāmitreṇa dhīmatā
GE09ram_01_u:052.021c: na dāsyāmīti śabalāṃ prāha rājan kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:052.022a: etad eva hi me ratnam etad eva hi me dhanam
GE09ram_01_u:052.022c: etad eva hi sarvasvam etad eva hi jīvitam
GE09ram_01_u:052.023a: darśaś ca pūrṇamāsaś ca yajñāś caivāptadakṣiṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:052.023c: etad eva hi me rājan vividhāś ca kriyās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:052.024a: adomūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā mama rājan na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:052.024c: bahūnāṃ kiṃ pralāpena na dāsye kāmadohinīm
GE09ram_01_u:053.001a: kāmadhenuṃ vasiṣṭho 'pi yadā na tyajate muniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:053.002a: nīyamānā tu śabalā rāma rājñā mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:053.004c: yan mām anāgasaṃ bhaktām iṣṭāṃ tyajati dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:053.005a: iti sā cintayitvā tu niḥśvasya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:053.006a: nirdhūya tāṃs tadā bhṛtyāñ śataśaḥ śatrusūdana
GE09ram_01_u:053.007a: śabalā sā rudantī ca krośantī cedam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:053.008a: bhagavan kiṃ parityaktā tvayāhaṃ brahmaṇaḥ suta
GE09ram_01_u:053.008c: yasmād rājabhṛtā māṃ hi nayante tvatsakāśataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:053.009a: evam uktas tu brahmarṣir idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:053.010a: na tvāṃ tyajāmi śabale nāpi me 'pakṛtaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:053.010c: eṣa tvāṃ nayate rājā balān matto mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:053.011a: na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ mahyaṃ rājā tv adya viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:053.011c: balī rājā kṣatriyaś ca pṛthivyāḥ patir eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:053.014c: brahman brahmabalaṃ divyaṃ kṣatrāt tu balavattaram
GE09ram_01_u:053.016c: tasya darpaṃ balaṃ yat tan nāśayāmi durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:053.017a: ity uktas tu tayā rāma vasiṣṭhaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:053.019c: pahlavān nāśayām āsa śastrair uccāvacair api
GE09ram_01_u:053.021a: tair āsīt saṃvṛtā bhūmiḥ śakair yavanamiśritaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:053.022c: nirdagdhaṃ tad balaṃ sarvaṃ pradīptair iva pāvakaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.001c: vasiṣṭhaś codayām āsa kāmadhuk sṛja yogataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.002c: ūdhasas tv atha saṃjātāḥ pahlavāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.003a: yonideśāc ca yavanaḥ śakṛddeśāc chakās tathā
GE09ram_01_u:054.004a: tais tan niṣūditaṃ sainyaṃ viśvamitrasya tatkṣaṇāt
GE09ram_01_u:054.006c: huṃkāreṇaiva tān sarvān nirdadāha mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.008a: dṛṣṭvā vināśitān putrān balaṃ ca sumahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.011a: sa putram ekaṃ rājyāya pālayeti niyujya ca
GE09ram_01_u:054.013a: kena cit tv atha kālena deveśo vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.014a: kimarthaṃ tapyase rājan brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:054.014c: varado 'smi varo yas te kāṅkṣitaḥ so 'bhidhīyatām
GE09ram_01_u:054.015a: evam uktas tu devena viśvāmitro mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.018c: evam astv iti deveśo vākyam uktvā divaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.021c: yais tat tapovanaṃ sarvaṃ nirdagdhaṃ cāstratejasā
GE09ram_01_u:054.022c: dṛṣṭvā vipradrutā bhītā munayaḥ śataśo diśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.023a: vasiṣṭhasya ca ye śiṣyās tathaiva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.025a: vadato vai vasiṣṭhasya mā bhaiṣṭeti muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.025c: nāśayāmy adya gādheyaṃ nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.026a: evam uktvā mahātejā vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:054.026c: viśvāmitraṃ tadā vākyaṃ saroṣam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:054.027c: durācāro 'si yan mūḍha tasmāt tvaṃ na bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_01_u:054.028a: ity uktvā paramakruddho daṇḍam udyamya satvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:055.001c: āgneyam astram utkṣipya tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:055.002a: vasiṣṭho bhagavān krodhād idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:055.003a: kṣatrabandho sthito 'smy eṣa yad balaṃ tad vidarśaya
GE09ram_01_u:055.003c: nāśayāmy eṣa te darpaṃ śastrasya tava gādhija
GE09ram_01_u:055.004a: kva ca te kṣatriyabalaṃ kva ca brahmabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:055.005c: brahmadaṇḍena tac chāntam agner vega ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_01_u:055.006a: vāruṇaṃ caiva raudraṃ ca aindraṃ pāśupataṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:055.007a: mānavaṃ mohanaṃ caiva gāndharvaṃ svāpanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:055.008a: śoṣaṇaṃ dāraṇaṃ caiva vajram astraṃ sudurjayam
GE09ram_01_u:055.008c: brahmapāśaṃ kālapāśaṃ vāruṇaṃ pāśam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:055.009a: pinākāstraṃ ca dayitaṃ śuṣkārdre aśanī tathā
GE09ram_01_u:055.009c: daṇḍāstram atha paiśācaṃ krauñcam astraṃ tathāiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:055.010c: vāyavyaṃ mathanaṃ caiva astraṃ hayaśiras tathā
GE09ram_01_u:055.011a: śaktidvayaṃ ca cikṣepa kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_01_u:055.011c: vaidyādharaṃ mahāstraṃ ca kālāstram atha dāruṇam
GE09ram_01_u:055.012a: triśūlam astraṃ ghoraṃ ca kāpālam atha kaṅkaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:055.013a: vasiṣṭhe japatāṃ śreṣṭhe tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE09ram_01_u:055.013c: tāni sarvāṇi daṇḍena grasate brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:055.014c: tad astram udyataṃ dṛṣṭvā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:055.016a: tad apy astraṃ mahāghoraṃ brāhmaṃ brāhmeṇa tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:055.020c: amoghaṃ te balaṃ brahmaṃs tejo dhāraya tejasā
GE09ram_01_u:055.021c: prasīda japatāṃ śreṣṭha lokāḥ santu gatavyathāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:055.022a: evam ukto mahātejāḥ śamaṃ cakre mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:055.024c: tapo mahat samāsthāsye yad vai brahmatvakārakam
GE09ram_01_u:056.002a: sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ gatvā mahiṣyā saha rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:056.005c: anena tapasā tvāṃ hi rājarṣir iti vidmahe
GE09ram_01_u:056.006a: evam uktvā mahātejā jagāma saha daivataiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:056.007a: viśvāmitro 'pi tac chrutvā hriyā kiṃ cid avāṅmukhaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:056.008a: tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ rājarṣir iti māṃ viduḥ
GE09ram_01_u:056.008c: devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve nāsti manye tapaḥphalam
GE09ram_01_u:056.009a: evaṃ niścitya manasā bhūya eva mahātapāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:056.010a: etasminn eva kāle tu satyavādī jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:056.011a: tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā yajeyam iti rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:056.012a: sa vasiṣṭhaṃ samāhūya kathayām āsa cintitam
GE09ram_01_u:056.012c: aśakyam iti cāpy ukto vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:056.013a: pratyākhyāto vasiṣṭhena sa yayau dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_01_u:056.013c: vasiṣṭhā dīrgha tapasas tapo yatra hi tepire
GE09ram_01_u:056.015a: so 'bhigamya mahātmānaḥ sarvān eva guroḥ sutān
GE09ram_01_u:056.018a: śirasā praṇato yāce brāhmaṇāṃs tapasi sthitān
GE09ram_01_u:056.018c: te māṃ bhavantaḥ siddhyarthaṃ yājayantu samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:056.019c: guruputrān ṛte sarvān nāhaṃ paśyāmi kāṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:056.020a: ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:056.020c: tasmād anantaraṃ sarve bhavanto daivataṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:057.003a: ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ purodhāḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.004a: aśakyam iti covāca vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.004c: taṃ vayaṃ vai samāhartuṃ kratuṃ śaktāḥ kathaṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:057.005a: bāliśas tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gamyatāṃ svapuraṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.006c: sa rājā punar evaitān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:057.007c: anyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.008a: ṛṣiputrās tu tac chrutvā vākyaṃ ghorābhisaṃhitam
GE09ram_01_u:057.008e: evam uktvā mahātmāno viviśus te svam āśramam
GE09ram_01_u:057.009a: atha rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.010a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mantriṇaḥ sarve tyaktvā caṇḍālarūpiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:057.011a: eko hi rājā kākutstha jagāma paramātmavān
GE09ram_01_u:057.012a: viśvāmitras tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ viphalīkṛtam
GE09ram_01_u:057.013a: kāruṇyāt sa mahātejā vākyaṃ parama dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.013c: idaṃ jagāda bhadraṃ te rājānaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:057.015a: atha tad vākyam ākarṇya rājā caṇḍālatāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.016c: anavāpyaiva taṃ kāmaṃ mayā prāpto viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.017a: saśarīro divaṃ yāyām iti me saumyadarśanam
GE09ram_01_u:057.017c: mayā ceṣṭaṃ kratuśataṃ tac ca nāvāpyate phalam
GE09ram_01_u:057.018a: anṛtaṃ nokta pūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
GE09ram_01_u:057.018c: kṛcchreṣv api gataḥ saumya kṣatradharmeṇa te śape
GE09ram_01_u:057.019a: yajñair bahuvidhair iṣṭaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.021a: daivam eva paraṃ manye pauruṣaṃ tu nirarthakam
GE09ram_01_u:057.021c: daivenākramyate sarvaṃ daivaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:057.023a: nānyāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyāmi nānyaḥ śaraṇam asti me
GE09ram_01_u:058.002a: ikṣvāko svāgataṃ vatsa jānāmi tvāṃ sudhārmikam
GE09ram_01_u:058.002c: śaraṇaṃ te bhaviṣyāmi mā bhaiṣīr nṛpapuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:058.004a: guruśāpakṛtaṃ rūpaṃ yad idaṃ tvayi vartate
GE09ram_01_u:058.005a: hastaprāptam ahaṃ manye svargaṃ tava nareśvara
GE09ram_01_u:058.005c: yas tvaṃ kauśikam āgamya śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:058.007a: sarvāñ śiṣyān samāhūya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:058.010a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā diśo jagmus tadājñayā
GE09ram_01_u:058.011a: te ca śiṣyāḥ samāgamya muniṃ jvalitatejasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:058.011c: ūcuś ca vacanaṃ sarve sarveṣāṃ brahmavādinām
GE09ram_01_u:058.012a: śrutvā te vacanaṃ sarve samāyānti dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:058.013c: yad āha vacanaṃ sarvaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:058.014c: kathaṃ sadasi bhoktāro havis tasya surarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:058.018a: yad dūṣayanty aduṣṭaṃ māṃ tapa ugraṃ samāsthitam
GE09ram_01_u:058.020c: vikṛtāś ca virūpāś ca lokān anucarantv imān
GE09ram_01_u:058.021a: mahodayaś ca durbuddhir mām adūṣyaṃ hy adūṣayat
GE09ram_01_u:059.002c: dharmiṣṭhaś ca vadānyaś ca māṃ caiva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.003c: tathā pravartyatāṃ yajño bhavadbhiś ca mayā saha
GE09ram_01_u:059.005c: yad āha vacanaṃ samyag etat kāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.006a: agnikalpo hi bhagavāñ śāpaṃ dāsyati roṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.006c: tasmāt pravartyatāṃ yajñaḥ saśarīro yathā divam
GE09ram_01_u:059.008a: evam uktvā maharṣayaḥ saṃjahrus tāḥ kriyās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:059.012a: sruvam udyamya sakrodhas triśaṅkum idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:059.012c: paśya me tapaso vīryaṃ svārjitasya nareśvara
GE09ram_01_u:059.013a: eṣa tvāṃ svaśarīreṇa nayāmi svargam ojasā
GE09ram_01_u:059.014a: svārjitaṃ kiṃ cid apy asti mayā hi tapasaḥ phalam
GE09ram_01_u:059.014c: rājaṃs tvaṃ tejasā tasya saśarīro divaṃ vraja
GE09ram_01_u:059.015c: divaṃ jagāma kākutstha munīnāṃ paśyatāṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:059.016c: saha sarvaiḥ suragaṇair idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:059.017a: triśaṅko gaccha bhūyas tvaṃ nāsi svargakṛtālayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.018a: evam ukto mahendreṇa triśaṅkur apatat punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.019a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya krośamānasya kauśikaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.019c: roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:059.022c: anyam indraṃ kariṣyāmi loko vā syād anindrakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.022e: daivatāny api sa krodhāt sraṣṭuṃ samupacakrame
GE09ram_01_u:059.024c: saśarīro divaṃ yātuṃ nārhaty eva tapodhana
GE09ram_01_u:059.026a: saśarīrasya bhadraṃ vas triśaṅkor asya bhūpateḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.027c: nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi māmakāni dhruvāṇy atha
GE09ram_01_u:059.028a: yāval lokā dhariṣyanti tiṣṭhantv etāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.028c: matkṛtāni surāḥ sarve tad anujñātum arhatha
GE09ram_01_u:059.029a: evam uktāḥ surāḥ sarve pratyūcur munipuṃgavam
GE09ram_01_u:059.030a: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te tiṣṭhantv etāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.032c: ṛṣibhiś ca mahātejā bāḍham ity āha devatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:059.033a: tato devā mahātmāno munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:060.001a: viśvāmitro mahātmātha prasthitān prekṣya tān ṛṣīn
GE09ram_01_u:060.002c: diśam anyāṃ prapatsyāmas tatra tapsyāmahe tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:060.003c: sukhaṃ tapaś cariṣyāmaḥ paraṃ tad dhi tapovanam
GE09ram_01_u:060.005a: etasminn eva kāle tu ayodhyādhipatir nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:060.006a: tasya vai yajamānasya paśum indro jahāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:060.006c: pranaṣṭe tu paśau vipro rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:060.007a: paśur adya hṛto rājan pranaṣṭas tava durnayāt
GE09ram_01_u:060.008a: prāyaścittaṃ mahad dhy etan naraṃ vā puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_01_u:060.008c: ānayasva paśuṃ śīghraṃ yāvat karma pravartate
GE09ram_01_u:060.009a: upādhyāya vacaḥ śrutvā sa rājā puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_01_u:060.010a: deśāñ janapadāṃs tāṃs tān nagarāṇi vanāni ca
GE09ram_01_u:060.012e: pṛṣṭvā sarvatra kuśalam ṛcīkaṃ tam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:060.014a: sarve parisṛtā deśā yajñiyaṃ na labhe paśum
GE09ram_01_u:060.014c: dātum arhasi mūlyena sutam ekam ito mama
GE09ram_01_u:060.015a: evam ukto mahātejā ṛcīkas tv abravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:060.015c: nāhaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ naraśreṣṭhaṃ vikrīṇīyāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:060.016a: ṛcīkasya vacaḥ śrutvā teṣāṃ mātā mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:060.017a: mamāpi dayitaṃ viddhi kaniṣṭhaṃ śunakaṃ nṛpa
GE09ram_01_u:060.018a: prāyeṇa hi naraśreṣṭha jyeṣṭhāḥ pitṛṣu vallabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:060.018c: mātḥṇāṃ ca kanīyāṃsas tasmād rakṣe kanīyasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:060.019a: uktavākye munau tasmin munipatnyāṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:060.019c: śunaḥśepaḥ svayaṃ rāma madhyamo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:060.020a: pitā jyeṣṭham avikreyaṃ mātā cāha kanīyasaṃ
GE09ram_01_u:060.020c: vikrītaṃ madhyamaṃ manye rājan putraṃ nayasva mām
GE09ram_01_u:060.022a: ambarīṣas tu rājarṣī ratham āropya satvaraḥ
GE09ram_01_u:061.002c: puṣkaraṃ śreṣṭham āgamya viśvāmitraṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:061.003a: viṣaṇṇavadano dīnas tṛṣṇayā ca śrameṇa ca
GE09ram_01_u:061.003c: papātāṅke mune rāma vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:061.004a: na me 'sti mātā na pitā jñātayo bāndhavāḥ kutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:061.004c: trātum arhasi māṃ saumya dharmeṇa munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:061.005a: trātā tvaṃ hi muniśreṣṭha sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ hi bhāvanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:061.005c: rājā ca kṛtakāryaḥ syād ahaṃ dīrghāyur avyayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:061.006a: svargalokam upāśnīyāṃ tapas taptvā hy anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:061.006c: sa me nātho hy anāthasya bhava bhavyena cetasā
GE09ram_01_u:061.006e: piteva putraṃ dharmātmaṃs trātum arhasi kilbiṣāt
GE09ram_01_u:061.007c: sāntvayitvā bahuvidhaṃ putrān idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:061.009a: ayaṃ munisuto bālo mattaḥ śaraṇam icchati
GE09ram_01_u:061.011a: nāthavāṃś ca śunaḥśepo yajñaś cāvighnato bhavet
GE09ram_01_u:061.011c: devatās tarpitāś ca syur mama cāpi kṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:061.012a: munes tu vacanaṃ śrutvā madhuṣyandādayaḥ sutāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:061.013c: akāryam iva paśyāmaḥ śvamāṃsam iva bhojane
GE09ram_01_u:061.014a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putrāṇāṃ munipuṃgavaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:061.015a: niḥsādhvasam idaṃ proktaṃ dharmād api vigarhitam
GE09ram_01_u:061.018c: vaiṣṇavaṃ yūpam āsādya vāgbhir agnim udāhara
GE09ram_01_u:061.019a: ime tu gāthe dve divye gāyethā muniputraka
GE09ram_01_u:061.020a: śunaḥśepo gṛhītvā te dve gāthe susamāhitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:061.020c: tvarayā rājasiṃhaṃ tam ambarīṣam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:061.022a: tad vākyam ṛṣiputrasya śrutvā harṣaṃ samutsukaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:061.023c: paśuṃ raktāmbaraṃ kṛtvā yūpe taṃ samabandhayat
GE09ram_01_u:061.024a: sa baddho vāgbhir agryābhir abhituṣṭāva vai surau
GE09ram_01_u:061.025c: dīrgham āyus tadā prādāc chunaḥśepāya rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:061.026a: sa ca rājā naraśreṣṭha yajñasya ca samāptavān
GE09ram_01_u:062.002c: ṛṣis tvam asi bhadraṃ te svārjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.003a: tam evam uktvā deveśas tridivaṃ punar abhyagāt
GE09ram_01_u:062.003c: viśvāmitro mahātejā bhūyas tepe mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.006a: dṛṣṭvā kandarpavaśago munis tām idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:062.006c: apsaraḥ svāgataṃ te 'stu vasa ceha mamāśrame
GE09ram_01_u:062.008a: tasyāṃ vasantyāṃ varṣāṇi pañca pañca ca rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:062.009a: atha kāle gate tasmin viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.013a: bhītām apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā vepantīṃ prāñjaliṃ sthitām
GE09ram_01_u:062.013e: uttaraṃ parvataṃ rāma viśvāmitro jagāma ha
GE09ram_01_u:062.014a: sa kṛtvā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ jetukāmo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.015a: tasya varṣasahasraṃ tu ghoraṃ tapa upāsataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.015c: uttare parvate rāma devatānām abhūd bhayam
GE09ram_01_u:062.019a: brahmaṇaḥ sa vacaḥ śrutvā viśvāmitras tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.020a: brahmarṣi śabdam atulaṃ svārjitaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.020c: yadi me bhagavān āha tato 'haṃ vijitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.021a: tam uvāca tato brahmā na tāvat tvaṃ jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.021c: yatasva muniśārdūla ity uktvā tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:062.024a: evaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi tapo ghoram upāgamat
GE09ram_01_u:062.025a: saṃbhramaḥ sumahān āsīt surāṇāṃ vāsavasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:062.025c: rambhām apsarasaṃ śakraḥ saha sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:063.001a: surakāryam idaṃ rambhe kartavyaṃ sumahat tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:063.003c: krodham utsrakṣyate ghoraṃ mayi deva na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:063.003e: tato hi me bhayaṃ deva prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:063.004c: mā bhaiṣi rambhe bhadraṃ te kuruṣva mama śāsanam
GE09ram_01_u:063.006a: tvaṃ hi rūpaṃ bahuguṇaṃ kṛtvā paramabhāsvaram
GE09ram_01_u:063.006c: tam ṛṣiṃ kauśikaṃ rambhe bhedayasva tapasvinam
GE09ram_01_u:063.007a: sā śrutvā vacanaṃ tasya kṛtvā rūpam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:063.008a: kokilasya tu śuśrāva valgu vyāharataḥ svanam
GE09ram_01_u:063.009c: darśanena ca rambhāyā muniḥ saṃdeham āgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:063.014a: tasya śāpena mahatā rambhā śailī tadābhavat
GE09ram_01_u:063.014c: vacaḥ śrutvā ca kandarpo maharṣeḥ sa ca nirgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:063.015c: indriyair ajitai rāma na lebhe śāntim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.001a: atha haimavatīṃ rāma diśaṃ tyaktvā mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.001c: pūrvāṃ diśam anuprāpya tapas tepe sudāruṇam
GE09ram_01_u:064.003c: vighnair bahubhir ādhūtaṃ krodho nāntaram āviśat
GE09ram_01_u:064.006a: na hy asya vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cid dṛśyate sūkṣmam apy atha
GE09ram_01_u:064.006c: na dīyate yadi tv asya manasā yad abhīpsitam
GE09ram_01_u:064.006g: vyākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā na ca kiṃ cit prakāśate
GE09ram_01_u:064.007a: sāgarāḥ kṣubhitāḥ sarve viśīryante ca parvatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.007c: prakampate ca pṛthivī vāyur vāti bhṛśākulaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.008a: buddhiṃ na kurute yāvan nāśe deva mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.009c: devarājye cikīrṣeta dīyatām asya yan matam
GE09ram_01_u:064.011a: brahmarṣe svāgataṃ te 'stu tapasā sma sutoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.012a: dīrgham āyuś ca te brahman dadāmi samarudgaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.012c: svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gaccha saumya yathāsukham
GE09ram_01_u:064.014a: brāhmaṇyaṃ yadi me prāptaṃ dīrgham āyus tathaiva ca
GE09ram_01_u:064.014c: oṃkāro 'tha vaṣaṭkāro vedāś ca varayantu mām
GE09ram_01_u:064.015c: brahmaputro vasiṣṭho mām evaṃ vadatu devatāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.015e: yady ayaṃ paramaḥ kāmaḥ kṛto yāntu surarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.016a: tataḥ prasādito devair vasiṣṭho japatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.016c: sakhyaṃ cakāra brahmarṣir evam astv iti cābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:064.017a: brahmarṣitvaṃ na saṃdehaḥ sarvaṃ saṃpatsyate tava
GE09ram_01_u:064.017c: ity uktvā devatāś cāpi sarvā jagmur yathāgatam
GE09ram_01_u:064.018c: pūjayām āsa brahmarṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ japatāṃ varam
GE09ram_01_u:064.019a: kṛtakāmo mahīṃ sarvāṃ cacāra tapasi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.019c: evaṃ tv anena brāhmaṇyaṃ prāptaṃ rāma mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:064.020a: eṣa rāma muniśreṣṭha eṣa vigrahavāṃs tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.020c: eṣa dharmaḥ paro nityaṃ vīryasyaiṣa parāyaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:064.022c: yajñaṃ kākutstha sahitaḥ prāptavān asi dhārmika
GE09ram_01_u:064.023c: guṇā bahuvidhāḥ prāptās tava saṃdarśanān mayā
GE09ram_01_u:064.024a: vistareṇa ca te brahman kīrtyamānaṃ mahat tapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.024c: śrutaṃ mayā mahātejo rāmeṇa ca mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:064.025a: sadasyaiḥ prāpya ca sadaḥ śrutās te bahavo guṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.026a: aprameyaṃ tapas tubhyam aprameyaṃ ca te balam
GE09ram_01_u:064.026c: aprameyā guṇāś caiva nityaṃ te kuśikātmaja
GE09ram_01_u:064.027a: tṛptir āścaryabhūtānāṃ kathānāṃ nāsti me vibho
GE09ram_01_u:064.028a: śvaḥ prabhāte mahātejo draṣṭum arhasi māṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:064.028c: svāgataṃ tapasāṃ śreṣṭha mām anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:065.002c: rāghavau ca mahātmānau tadā vākyam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:065.003a: bhagavan svāgataṃ te 'stu kiṃ karomi tavānagha
GE09ram_01_u:065.003c: bhavān ājñāpayatu mām ājñāpyo bhavatā hy aham
GE09ram_01_u:065.004a: evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā janakena mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:065.005c: draṣṭukāmau dhanuḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yad etat tvayi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_01_u:065.006a: etad darśaya bhadraṃ te kṛtakāmau nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_01_u:065.007a: evam uktas tu janakaḥ pratyuvāca mahāmunim
GE09ram_01_u:065.007c: śrūyatām asya dhanuṣo yad artham iha tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_01_u:065.008a: devarāta iti khyāto nimeḥ ṣaṣṭho mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:065.008c: nyāso 'yaṃ tasya bhagavan haste datto mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:065.009c: rudras tu tridaśān roṣāt salilam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:065.010a: yasmād bhāgārthino bhāgān nākalpayata me surāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:065.011a: tato vimanasaḥ sarve devā vai munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:065.012a: prītiyuktaḥ sa sarveṣāṃ dadau teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_01_u:065.013c: nyāsabhūtaṃ tadā nyastam asmākaṃ pūrvake vibho
GE09ram_01_u:065.014a: atha me kṛṣataḥ kṣetraṃ lāṅgalād utthitā mama
GE09ram_01_u:065.014c: kṣetraṃ śodhayatā labdhvā nāmnā sīteti viśrutā
GE09ram_01_u:065.015a: bhūtalād utthitā sā tu vyavardhata mamātmajā
GE09ram_01_u:065.016a: bhūtalād utthitāṃ tāṃ tu vardhamānāṃ mamātmajām
GE09ram_01_u:065.017c: vīryaśulketi bhagavan na dadāmi sutām aham
GE09ram_01_u:065.019c: na śekur grahaṇe tasya dhanuṣas tolane 'pi vā
GE09ram_01_u:065.020a: teṣāṃ vīryavatāṃ vīryam alpaṃ jñātvā mahāmune
GE09ram_01_u:065.023a: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe kṣayaṃ yātāni sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:065.025a: tato bhagnā nṛpatayo hanyamānā diśo yayuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:065.027a: yady asya dhanuṣo rāmaḥ kuryād āropaṇaṃ mune
GE09ram_01_u:065.027c: sutām ayonijāṃ sītāṃ dadyāṃ dāśarather aham
GE09ram_01_u:066.001c: dhanur darśaya rāmāya iti hovāca pārthivam
GE09ram_01_u:066.002a: tataḥ sa rājā janakaḥ sacivān vyādideśa ha
GE09ram_01_u:066.003c: tad dhanuḥ purataḥ kṛtvā nirjagmuḥ pārthivājñayā
GE09ram_01_u:066.004c: mañjūṣām aṣṭacakrāṃ tāṃ samūhas te kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_01_u:066.005a: tām ādāya tu mañjūṣām āyatīṃ yatra tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:066.005c: suropamaṃ te janakam ūcur nṛpati mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:066.007a: teṣāṃ nṛpo vacaḥ śrutvā kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:066.008c: rājabhiś ca mahāvīryair aśakyaṃ pūrituṃ tadā
GE09ram_01_u:066.009a: naitat suragaṇāḥ sarve nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:066.010a: kva gatir mānuṣāṇāṃ ca dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
GE09ram_01_u:066.011a: tad etad dhanuṣāṃ śreṣṭham ānītaṃ munipuṃgava
GE09ram_01_u:066.012c: vatsa rāma dhanuḥ paśya iti rāghavam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:066.013a: maharṣer vacanād rāmo yatra tiṣṭhati tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:066.013c: mañjūṣāṃ tām apāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā dhanur athābravīt
GE09ram_01_u:066.014c: yatnavāṃś ca bhaviṣyāmi tolane pūraṇe 'pi vā
GE09ram_01_u:066.015a: bāḍham ity eva taṃ rājā muniś ca samabhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:066.015c: līlayā sa dhanur madhye jagrāha vacanān muneḥ
GE09ram_01_u:066.016c: āropayat sa dharmātmā salīlam iva tad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:066.017a: āropayitvā maurvīṃ ca pūrayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_01_u:066.017c: tad babhañja dhanur madhye naraśreṣṭho mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:066.019a: nipetuś ca narāḥ sarve tena śabdena mohitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:066.019c: vrajayitvā munivaraṃ rājānaṃ tau ca rāghavau
GE09ram_01_u:066.021c: atyadbhutam acintyaṃ ca atarkitam idaṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:066.022a: janakānāṃ kule kīrtim āhariṣyati me sutā
GE09ram_01_u:066.023a: mama satyā pratijñā ca vīryaśulketi kauśika
GE09ram_01_u:066.023c: sītā prāṇair bahumatā deyā rāmāya me sutā
GE09ram_01_u:066.024c: mama kauśika bhadraṃ te ayodhyāṃ tvaritā rathaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:066.025a: rājānaṃ praśritair vākyair ānayantu puraṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:066.026a: muniguptau ca kākutsthau kathayantu nṛpāya vai
GE09ram_01_u:066.027a: kauśikaś ca tathety āha rājā cābhāṣya mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:067.001c: trirātram uṣitvā mārge te 'yodhyāṃ prāviśan purīm
GE09ram_01_u:067.008a: seyaṃ mama sutā rājan viśvāmitra puraḥsaraiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:067.009a: tac ca rājan dhanur divyaṃ madhye bhagnaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_01_u:067.010a: asmai deyā mayā sītā vīryaśulkā mahātmane
GE09ram_01_u:067.010c: pratijñāṃ tartum icchāmi tad anujñātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:067.011c: śīghram āgaccha bhadraṃ te draṣṭum arhasi rāghavau
GE09ram_01_u:067.012a: prītiṃ ca mama rājendra nirvartayitum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:067.012c: putrayor ubhayor eva prītiṃ tvam api lapsyase
GE09ram_01_u:067.014a: dūtavākyaṃ tu tac chrutvā rājā paramaharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:067.014c: vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca mantriṇo 'nyāṃś ca so 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:067.015c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā videheṣu vasaty asau
GE09ram_01_u:067.016c: saṃpradānaṃ sutāyās tu rāghave kartum icchati
GE09ram_01_u:067.017a: yadi vo rocate vṛttaṃ janakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:067.017c: purīṃ gacchāmahe śīghraṃ mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:067.018a: mantriṇo bāḍham ity āhuḥ saha sarvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:067.018c: suprītaś cābravīd rājā śvo yātreti sa mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:067.019c: ūṣuḥ pramuditāḥ sarve guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:068.001c: rājā daśaratho hṛṣṭaḥ sumantram idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:068.002a: adya sarve dhanādhyakṣā dhanam ādāya puṣkalam
GE09ram_01_u:068.004a: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:068.004c: mārkaṇḍeyaś ca dīrghāyur ṛṣiḥ kātyāyanas tathā
GE09ram_01_u:068.005a: ete dvijāḥ prayāntv agre syandanaṃ yojayasva me
GE09ram_01_u:068.005c: yathā kālātyayo na syād dūtā hi tvarayanti mām
GE09ram_01_u:068.006a: vacanāc ca narendrasya sā senā caturaṅgiṇī
GE09ram_01_u:068.007c: rājā tu janakaḥ śrīmāñ śrutvā pūjām akalpayat
GE09ram_01_u:068.008a: tato rājānam āsādya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_01_u:068.008c: janako mudito rājā harṣaṃ ca paramaṃ yayau
GE09ram_01_u:068.009a: svāgataṃ te mahārāja diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:068.010a: diṣṭyā prāpto mahātejā vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:068.010c: saha sarvair dvijaśreṣṭhair devair iva śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:068.011a: diṣṭyā me nirjitā vighnā diṣṭyā me pūjitaṃ kulam
GE09ram_01_u:068.014a: pratigraho dātṛvaśaḥ śrutam etan mayā purā
GE09ram_01_u:068.014c: yathā vakṣyasi dharmajña tat kariṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:068.015a: tad dharmiṣṭhaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca vacanaṃ satyavādinaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:068.016c: harṣeṇa mahatā yuktās tāṃ niśām avasan sukham
GE09ram_01_u:068.017a: rājā ca rāghavau putrau niśāmya pariharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:068.018c: yajñasya ca sutābhyāṃ ca kṛtvā rātrim uvāsa ha
GE09ram_01_u:069.002c: kuśadhvaja iti khyātaḥ purīm adhyavasac chubhām
GE09ram_01_u:069.004a: tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi yajñagoptā sa me mataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.004c: prītiṃ so 'pi mahātejā iṃmāṃ bhoktā mayā saha
GE09ram_01_u:069.008c: upaviṣṭāv ubhau tau tu bhrātarāv amitaujasau
GE09ram_01_u:069.010a: aupakāryāṃ sa gatvā tu raghūṇāṃ kulavardhanam
GE09ram_01_u:069.012c: sabandhur agamat tatra janako yatra vartate
GE09ram_01_u:069.013c: vākyaṃ vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭho vaideham idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:069.014c: vaktā sarveṣu kṛtyeṣu vasiṣṭho bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.015c: eṣa vakṣyati dharmātmā vasiṣṭho me yathākramam
GE09ram_01_u:069.017c: tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.018a: vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivaivataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.018c: manuḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.019a: tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam
GE09ram_01_u:069.019c: ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān vikukṣir udapadyata
GE09ram_01_u:069.020a: vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:069.021a: anaraṇyāt pṛthur jajñe triśaṅkus tu pṛthoḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.023a: māndhātus tu sutaḥ śrīmān susaṃdhir udapadyata
GE09ram_01_u:069.023c: susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
GE09ram_01_u:069.024a: yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.024c: bharatāt tu mahātejā asito nāma jāyata
GE09ram_01_u:069.025a: saha tena gareṇaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_01_u:069.026c: bhagīrathāt kakutsthaś ca kakutsthasya raghus tathā
GE09ram_01_u:069.027a: raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.027c: kalmāṣapādo hy abhavat tasmāj jātas tu śaṅkhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.028c: śīghragas tv agnivarṇasya śīghragasya maruḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:069.029a: maroḥ praśuśrukas tv āsīd ambarīṣaḥ praśuśrukāt
GE09ram_01_u:069.030a: nahuṣasya yayātis tu nābhāgas tu yayātijaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.001c: śrotum arhasi bhadraṃ te kulaṃ naḥ kīrtitaṃ param
GE09ram_01_u:070.003a: rājābhūt triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_01_u:070.004a: tasya putro mithir nāma janako mithi putrakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.004c: prathamo janako nāma janakād apy udāvasuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.005a: udāvasos tu dharmātmā jāto vai nandivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.005c: nandivardhana putras tu suketur nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.008c: dhṛṣṭaketos tu rājarṣer haryaśva iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.009a: haryaśvasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ pratīndhakaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.013c: jyeṣṭho 'ham anujo bhrātā mama vīraḥ kuśadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.014a: māṃ tu jyeṣṭhaṃ pitā rājye so 'bhiṣicya narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.014c: kuśadhvajaṃ samāveśya bhāraṃ mayi vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.015a: vṛddhe pitari svaryāte dharmeṇa dhuram āvaham
GE09ram_01_u:070.016a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya sāṃkāśyād agamat purāt
GE09ram_01_u:070.017a: sa ca me preṣayām āsa śaivaṃ dhanur anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:070.017c: sītā kanyā ca padmākṣī mahyaṃ vai dīyatām iti
GE09ram_01_u:070.018a: tasyāpradānād brahmarṣe yuddham āsīn mayā saha
GE09ram_01_u:070.018c: sa hato 'bhimukho rājā sudhanvā tu mayā raṇe
GE09ram_01_u:070.020a: kanīyān eṣa me bhrātā ahaṃ jyeṣṭho mahāmune
GE09ram_01_u:070.021a: sītāṃ rāmāya bhadraṃ te ūrmilāṃ lakṣmaṇāya ca
GE09ram_01_u:070.022a: dvitīyām ūrmilāṃ caiva trir vadāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:070.023c: pitṛkāryaṃ ca bhadraṃ te tato vaivāhikaṃ kuru
GE09ram_01_u:070.024a: maghā hy adya mahābāho tṛtīye divase prabho
GE09ram_01_u:070.024c: phalgunyām uttare rājaṃs tasmin vaivāhikaṃ kuru
GE09ram_01_u:071.002c: ikṣvākūṇāṃ videhānāṃ naiṣāṃ tulyo 'sti kaś cana
GE09ram_01_u:071.004a: vaktavyaṃ na naraśreṣṭha śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_01_u:071.005a: bhrātā yavīyān dharmajña eṣa rājā kuśadhvajaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:071.006c: varayema sute rājaṃs tayor arthe mahātmanoḥ
GE09ram_01_u:071.010c: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vaḥ kuśadhvajasute ime
GE09ram_01_u:071.013a: evam uktvā vacaḥ saumyaṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_01_u:071.013c: ubhau munivarau rājā janako vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:071.014a: paro dharmaḥ kṛto mahyaṃ śiṣyo 'smi bhavatoḥ sadā
GE09ram_01_u:071.015c: prabhutve nāsit saṃdeho yathārhaṃ kartum arhathaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:071.018a: svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te gamiṣyāmi svam ālayam
GE09ram_01_u:071.019a: tam āpṛṣṭvā narapatiṃ rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:071.020a: sa gatvā nilayaṃ rājā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:071.020c: prabhāte kālyam utthāya cakre godānam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:071.021c: ekaikaśo dadau rājā putrān uddhiśya dharmataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:071.023a: vittam anyac ca subahu dvijebhyo raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:071.024a: sa sutaiḥ kṛtagodānair vṛtaś ca nṛpatis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:072.001a: yasmiṃs tu divase rājā cakre godānam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:072.001c: tasmiṃs tu divase śūro yudhājit samupeyivān
GE09ram_01_u:072.002c: dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_01_u:072.005a: śrutvā tv ahaym ayodhyāyāṃ vivāhārthaṃ tāv ātmajān
GE09ram_01_u:072.005c: mithilām upayātās tu tvayā saha mahīpate
GE09ram_01_u:072.007c: tatas tām uṣito rātriṃ saha putrair mahātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:072.009a: vasiṣṭhaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīn aparān api
GE09ram_01_u:072.013a: kaḥ sthitaḥ pratihāro me kasyājñā saṃpratīkṣyate
GE09ram_01_u:072.013c: svagṛhe ko vicāro 'sti yathā rājyam idaṃ tava
GE09ram_01_u:072.014c: mama kanyā muniśreṣṭha dīptā vahner ivārciṣaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:072.015c: avighnaṃ kurutāṃ rājā kimarthaṃ hi vilambyate
GE09ram_01_u:072.016c: praveśayām āsa sutān sarvān ṛṣigaṇān api
GE09ram_01_u:072.017c: iyaṃ sītā mama sutā sahadharmacarī tava
GE09ram_01_u:072.017e: pratīccha caināṃ bhadraṃ te pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva pāṇinā
GE09ram_01_u:072.018a: lakṣmaṇāgaccha bhadraṃ te ūrmilām udyatāṃ mayā
GE09ram_01_u:072.018c: pratīccha pāṇiṃ gṛhṇīṣva mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:072.019a: tam evam uktvā janako bharataṃ cābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_01_u:072.021a: sarve bhavantaḥ saṃyāś ca sarve sucaritavratāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:072.021c: patnībhiḥ santu kākutsthā mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:072.022a: janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā pāṇīn pāṇibhir aspṛśan
GE09ram_01_u:072.022c: catvāras te catasṛṇāṃ vasiṣṭhasya mate sthitāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:072.023a: agniṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ rājānam eva ca
GE09ram_01_u:072.023c: ṛṣīṃś caiva mahātmānaḥ saha bhāryā raghūttamāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:072.025a: nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghā gandharvāś ca jaguḥ kalam
GE09ram_01_u:072.026c: trir agniṃ te parikramya ūhur bhāryā mahaujasaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:073.003a: atha rājā videhānāṃ dadau kanyādhanaṃ bahu
GE09ram_01_u:073.005a: dadau kanyā pitā tāsāṃ dāsīdāsam anuttamam
GE09ram_01_u:073.009a: ghorāḥ sma pakṣiṇo vāco vyāharanti tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:073.009c: bhaumāś caiva mṛgāḥ sarve gacchanti sma pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_01_u:073.010c: asaumyāḥ pakṣiṇo ghorā mṛgāś cāpi pradakṣiṇāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:073.010e: kim idaṃ hṛdayotkampi mano mama viṣīdati
GE09ram_01_u:073.011a: rājño daśarathasyaitac chrutvā vākyaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:073.011c: uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śrūyatām asya yat phalam
GE09ram_01_u:073.012a: upasthitaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ divyaṃ pakṣimukhāc cyutam
GE09ram_01_u:073.012c: mṛgāḥ praśamayanty ete saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_01_u:073.013a: teṣāṃ saṃvadatāṃ tatra vāyuḥ prādur babhūva ha
GE09ram_01_u:073.013c: kampayan medinīṃ sarvāṃ pātayaṃś ca drumāṃḥ śubhān
GE09ram_01_u:073.014a: tamasā saṃvṛtaḥ sūryaḥ sarvā na prababhur diśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:073.014c: bhasmanā cāvṛtaṃ sarvaṃ saṃmūḍham iva tad balam
GE09ram_01_u:073.015a: vasiṣṭha ṛṣayaś cānye rājā ca sasutas tadā
GE09ram_01_u:073.015c: sasaṃjñā iva tatrāsan sarvam anyad vicetanam
GE09ram_01_u:073.016a: tasmiṃs tamasi ghore tu bhasmacchanneva sā camūḥ
GE09ram_01_u:073.017a: kailāsam iva durdharṣaṃ kālāgnim iva duḥsaham
GE09ram_01_u:073.018c: pragṛhya śaramukhyaṃ ca tripuraghnaṃ yathā haram
GE09ram_01_u:073.019a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasaṃkāśaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE09ram_01_u:073.019e: saṃgatā munayaḥ sarve saṃjajalpur atho mithaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:073.020e: kṣatrasyotsādanaṃ bhūyo na khalv asya cikīrṣitam
GE09ram_01_u:073.021c: ṛṣayo rāma rāmeti madhurāṃ vācam abruvan
GE09ram_01_u:073.022a: pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjām ṛṣidattāṃ pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:074.001a: rāma dāśarathe vīra vīryaṃ te śrūyate 'dhutam
GE09ram_01_u:074.001c: dhanuṣo bhedanaṃ caiva nikhilena mayā śrutam
GE09ram_01_u:074.002a: tad adbhutam acintyaṃ ca bhedanaṃ dhanuṣas tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:074.002c: tac chrutvāham anuprāpto dhanur gṛhyāparaṃ śubham
GE09ram_01_u:074.003a: tad idaṃ ghorasaṃkāśaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:074.004a: tad ahaṃ te balaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanuṣo 'sya prapūraṇe
GE09ram_01_u:074.005a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarataḥs tadā
GE09ram_01_u:074.006c: bālānāṃ mama putrāṇām abhayaṃ dātum arhasi
GE09ram_01_u:074.008a: sa tvaṃ dharmaparo bhūtvā kāśyapāya vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_01_u:074.009c: na caikasmin hate rāme sarve jīvāmahe vayam
GE09ram_01_u:074.011a: ime dve dhanuṣī śreṣṭhe divye lokābhiviśrute
GE09ram_01_u:074.012c: tripuraghnaṃ naraśreṣṭha bhagnaṃ kākutsha yat tvayā
GE09ram_01_u:074.013a: idaṃ dvitīyaṃ durdharṣaṃ viṣṇor dattaṃ surottamaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:074.013c: samānasāraṃ kākutstha raudreṇa dhanuṣā tv idam
GE09ram_01_u:074.014a: tadā tu devatāḥ sarvāḥ pṛcchanti sma pitāmaham
GE09ram_01_u:074.015c: virodhaṃ janayām āsa tayoḥ satyavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:074.016a: virodhe ca mahad yuddham abhavad romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_01_u:074.017a: tadā taj jṛmbhitaṃ śaivaṃ dhanur bhīmaparākramam
GE09ram_01_u:074.018c: yācitau praśamaṃ tatra jagmatus tau surottamau
GE09ram_01_u:074.019a: jṛmbhitaṃ tad dhanur dṛṣṭvā śaivaṃ viṣṇuparākramaiḥ
GE09ram_01_u:074.019c: adhikaṃ menire viṣṇuṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā
GE09ram_01_u:074.020a: dhanū rudras tu saṃkruddho videheṣu mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_01_u:074.021a: idaṃ ca viṣṇavaṃ rāma dhanuḥ parapuraṃjayam
GE09ram_01_u:074.021c: ṛcīke bhārgave prādād viṣṇuḥ sa nyāsam uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:074.022c: pitur mama dadau divyaṃ jamadagner mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:074.023c: arjuno vidadhe mṛtyuṃ prākṛtāṃ buddhim āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:074.024a: vadham apratirūpaṃ tu pituḥ śrutvā sudāruṇam
GE09ram_01_u:074.024c: kṣatram utsādayaṃ roṣāj jātaṃ jātam anekaśaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:074.026c: śrutavān dhanuṣo bhedaṃ tato 'haṃ drutam āgataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:074.027a: tad idaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ rāma pitṛpaitāmahaṃ mahat
GE09ram_01_u:074.028c: yadi śaknoṣi kākutstha dvandvaṃ dāsyāmi te tataḥ
GE09ram_01_u:075.001a: śrutvā taj jāmadagnyasya vākyaṃ dāśarathis tadā
GE09ram_01_u:075.002a: śrutavān asmi yat karma kṛtavān asi bhārgava
GE09ram_01_u:075.003c: avajānāmi me tejaḥ paśya me 'dya parākramam
GE09ram_01_u:075.004a: ity uktvā rāghavaḥ kruddho bhārgavasya varāyudham
GE09ram_01_u:075.005a: āropya sa dhanū rāmaḥ śaraṃ sajyaṃ cakāra ha
GE09ram_01_u:075.005c: jāmadagnyaṃ tato rāmaṃ rāmaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:075.006c: tasmāc chakto na te rāma moktuṃ prāṇaharaṃ śaram
GE09ram_01_u:075.007c: lokān apratimān vāpi haniṣyāmi yad icchasi
GE09ram_01_u:075.008a: na hy ayaṃ vaiṣṇavo divyaḥ śaraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:075.010c: yakṣarākṣasanāgāś ca tad draṣṭuṃ mahad adbhutam
GE09ram_01_u:075.012c: rāmaṃ kamala patrākṣaṃ mandaṃ mandam uvāca ha
GE09ram_01_u:075.013a: kāśyapāya mayā dattā yadā pūrvaṃ vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_01_u:075.013c: viṣaye me na vastavyam iti māṃ kāśyapo 'bravīt
GE09ram_01_u:075.014a: so 'haṃ guruvacaḥ kurvan pṛthivyāṃ na vase niśām
GE09ram_01_u:075.014c: iti pratijñā kākutstha kṛtā vai kāśyapasya ha
GE09ram_01_u:075.015a: tad imāṃ tvaṃ gatiṃ vīra hantuṃ nārhasi rāghava
GE09ram_01_u:075.016a: lokās tv apratimā rāma nirjitās tapasā mayā
GE09ram_01_u:075.016c: jahi tāñ śaramukhyena mā bhūt kālasya paryayaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:075.019a: na ceyaṃ mama kākutstha vrīḍā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_01_u:075.020a: śaram apratimaṃ rāma moktum arhasi suvrata
GE09ram_01_u:075.021a: tathā bruvati rāme tu jāmadagnye pratāpavān
GE09ram_01_u:075.021c: rāmo dāśarathiḥ śrīmāṃś cikṣepa śaram uttamam
GE09ram_01_u:075.022a: tato vitimirāḥ sarvā diśā copadiśas tathā
GE09ram_01_u:075.023a: rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ praśasya ca
GE09ram_01_u:076.001a: gate rāme praśāntātmā rāmo dāśarathir dhanuḥ
GE09ram_01_u:076.002a: abhivādya tato rāmo vasiṣṭha pramukhān ṛṣīn
GE09ram_01_u:076.004a: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_01_u:076.005a: gato rāma iti śrutvā hṛṣṭaḥ pramudito nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:076.005c: codayām āsa tāṃ senāṃ jagāmāśu tataḥ purīm
GE09ram_01_u:076.008a: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca sumadhyamā
GE09ram_01_u:076.009a: tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgām ūrmilāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_01_u:076.011c: remire muditāḥ sarvā bhartṛbhiḥ sahitā rahaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:076.014a: rāmas tu sītayā sārdhaṃ vijahāra bahūn ṛtūn
GE09ram_01_u:076.014c: manasvī tadgatas tasyā nityaṃ hṛdi samarpitaḥ
GE09ram_01_u:076.015a: priyā tu sītā rāmasya dārāḥ pitṛkṛtā iti
GE09ram_01_u:076.015c: guṇād rūpaguṇāc cāpi prītir bhūyo vyavardhata
GE09ram_01_u:076.016a: tasyāś ca bhartā dviguṇaṃ hṛdaye parivartate
GE09ram_01_u:076.016c: antarjātam api vyaktam ākhyāti hṛdayaṃ hṛdā
GE09ram_01_u:076.017c: devatābhiḥ samā rūpe sītā śrīr iva rūpiṇī
GE09ram_01_u:076.018c: atīva rāmaḥ śuśubhe 'tikāmayā; vibhuḥ śriyā viṣṇur ivāmareśvaraḥ
